['', 'A familiarity with standard safety best practices', 'A mission-driven group of kind coworkersFlexible hours & paid time offOpportunity to push the envelope, safely make mistakes, and learn from themA sweet workplace with lots of outdoor space\xa0An environment where you can grow as a human and teammateSnacks, and lunch on test daysStock option compensationMedical and dental insuranceCommuter benefits\xa0Traditional and Roth 401kPaid parental leaveThe chance to do right by our planet and build a future we can all be proud of\xa0', 'Flexible hours & paid time off', 'About Charm', 'You solve problems with creativity and curiosity\xa0You take high ownership of your designs from end-to-endYou are eager to learn and teach others\xa0You readily challenge your assumptions when faced with a difficult problemYou collaboratively seek out teammates for feedback and adviceYou care deeply about our mission & the transition to a greener, more equitable future', 'You have an eye for when a simple script can replace manual or inefficient tasks\xa0', 'You take high ownership of your designs from end-to-end', 'A mission-driven group of kind coworkers', 'You have a deep dislike, but reluctant acceptance of the need for, ladder logic systems', 'The desire to seek out the edge cases before they find us', 'Traditional and Roth 401k', 'You get a kick out of clever server naming', 'Software Engineer', 'You care deeply about our mission & the transition to a greener, more equitable future', 'About Your Team', 'In lieu of a cover letter, we ask our candidates to submit a portfolio, Github, or write-up of some professional and/or personal project examples. You may submit a website or attachment with this work using the forms provided. Ideally, these project examples include at least an image and a few words about each project. We only need a few to get a sense of your work! If you have any questions at all, or need support with making one, do not hesitate to reach out and ask! We are here to help.\xa0', 'You collaboratively seek out teammates for feedback and advice', 'You bring experience debugging low-level ethernet, USB, and other protocols', 'We encourage everyone to bring their whole selves to work each day. We don’t sweep mistakes under the rug, instead we pin them to the wall and learn from them. We believe whether you respect and trust your teammates is more important than whether you have ‘single-handedly saved the organization from catastrophe on no less than three occasions.’ That being said, we have a planet to save and no time to waste! So we hope you will join us on our quest to collectively improve our planet, our company, and ourselves.', 'Medical and dental insurance', 'As a software engineer at Charm Industrial you’ll be responsible for designing and implementing control, data analysis, and automation for our little earth-saving robots. Each element of the system requires its own little bit of software - ladder logic on the PLCs, Python on the GUIs, C on low-level hardware, database work on the data side, and small linux scripts on the servers. In the intersection of all of these systems there’s always something interesting to work on.\xa0', 'The chance to do right by our planet and build a future we can all be proud of\xa0', 'You solve problems with creativity and curiosity\xa0', 'Opportunity to push the envelope, safely make mistakes, and learn from them', 'You readily challenge your assumptions when faced with a difficult problem', 'You are eager to learn and teach others\xa0', 'What We Offer', 'You have built a foundation of software and network security best practices', "We’re designing and building these modular, chemical plants in-house. We are almost three years in, and have developed several iterations of the technology that we plan to commercialize soon. To help with this effort we're looking to expand our team of creative and hands-on engineers, fabricators, and forward-thinking humans.\xa0", 'Paid parental leave', 'In this role, you will bring:', '\ufeffOur Commitment', 'Portfolio Ask', 'Experience with software for embedded systems, linux, and similar systemsCareful note taking, flow-chart building, & verbose comment generationThe ability to write code others can debug (e.g. boiler_flare_status not b13_s)The desire to seek out the edge cases before they find usA familiarity with standard safety best practices', 'Careful note taking, flow-chart building, & verbose comment generation', 'Stock option compensation', 'These skills are bonus, but not essential:\xa0', 'Experience with software for embedded systems, linux, and similar systems', 'Charm Industrial is a venture-backed startup in San Francisco with a mission to reverse climate change and return the atmosphere to 280ppm CO2. While we are constantly searching for impactful ways to accomplish this, we have uncovered an initial path we are excited about pursuing. First, we convert waste biomass into a carbon-containing fluid called bio-oil. Then, we inject the bio-oil into permanent, underground storage wells as negative emissions, or reform it to produce green hydrogen for fuels and industrial chemicals, or to produce syngas for green steel production.\xa0', 'The ability to write code others can debug (e.g. boiler_flare_status not b13_s)', 'You would make a great addition to the team if...', 'An environment where you can grow as a human and teammate', 'Snacks, and lunch on test days', "You’ll be joining a small team of kind people who value psychological safety and collaboration. We discuss our problems openly as a team, review each other's work across disciplines, and help each other to build, test, and grow. We believe that our company can only do our best work if everyone feels comfortable asking questions and sharing their ideas. We value everyone’s unique backgrounds and value how new perspectives shape our designs.", 'A sweet workplace with lots of outdoor space\xa0', 'Charm Industrial is an equal opportunity employer with a firm commitment to growing our team in an inclusive way, regardless of race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, medical condition, age, or veteran status. The consequences of climate change inherently affect some more than others, and we need a diverse team to help us save our little planet most effectively & justly. We are excited about all of those who choose to apply, and for those who end up joining us, to see how you better us as a team and company. We are more than the sum of our parts.', 'Your Responsibilities', 'Commuter benefits\xa0', 'You have an eye for when a simple script can replace manual or inefficient tasks\xa0You have a deep dislike, but reluctant acceptance of the need for, ladder logic systemsYou bring experience debugging low-level ethernet, USB, and other protocolsYou have built a foundation of software and network security best practicesYou get a kick out of clever server naming']

['', 'Data Platform Software Engineer', 'Pluses:', 'By joining this Platform team, you’ll have the unique opportunity to work with other passionate and skilled engineers to make a lasting impacting in improving the quality of healthcare.', 'Explore and pioneer novel technical solutions in the healthcare space. Most of this hasn’t been done before, so you’ll be uniquely positioned to pave the wayHelp define a brand new product from the ground upUse the best tools/tech for the job, which means working on a diverse, polyglot codebaseWork on a cross-functional team of engineers and data scientists to design and build a scalable and efficient data pipelinePartner closely with data scientists to help them scale and productionalize the healthcare analytics they create', 'Our\xa0San Francisco, CA\xa0based Healthcare Data client is seeking a\xa0Data Platform Software Engineer to join their team building an impactful new product to help turn value-based care into a reality within the U.S healthcare system.', '\xa0San Francisco, CA', 'Responsibilities:', '3+ years of software engineering experience with a clear understanding of industry best practicesProven leadership, organization, and communication skillsComfort with ambiguity and possessing the ability to prioritize tasks across multiple stakeholdersA healthy bias towards actionKnowledge of computer science fundamentals (such as debugging or object-oriented design) and software engineering processes (such as agile software development, test automation, and continuous integration)Working experience with distributed computing infrastructure (Hadoop, Spark, Flink, etc) and knowledge of large-scale, analysis-heavy database fundamentalsProficiency in SQL and at least two commonly used programming languages, such as Python, JavaScript, Go, Java, or ScalaA passion for developing scalable, maintainable, testable codeThe ability to understand the big picture and align your work with larger organizational priorities', 'At the core of this is a considerable amount of data from various sources. The Platform team is building a high throughput pipeline to efficiently calculate performance measures for providers, identify opportunities for improvement, and present these insights in an easily digestible way. This involves running complicated data pipelines on distributed computing clusters with up to real-time data input.', 'Experience working on or collaborating with data analytics teamsExperience with either full stack/frontend or devops work helpful', 'Required:', 'A healthy bias towards action', 'Comfort with ambiguity and possessing the ability to prioritize tasks across multiple stakeholders', 'A passion for developing scalable, maintainable, testable code', 'Help define a brand new product from the ground up', 'Experience working on or collaborating with data analytics teams', 'Use the best tools/tech for the job, which means working on a diverse, polyglot codebase', 'Partner closely with data scientists to help them scale and productionalize the healthcare analytics they create', 'Experience with either full stack/frontend or devops work helpful', 'The ability to understand the big picture and align your work with larger organizational priorities', 'Proven leadership, organization, and communication skills', 'Working experience with distributed computing infrastructure (Hadoop, Spark, Flink, etc) and knowledge of large-scale, analysis-heavy database fundamentals', 'Knowledge of computer science fundamentals (such as debugging or object-oriented design) and software engineering processes (such as agile software development, test automation, and continuous integration)', 'Work on a cross-functional team of engineers and data scientists to design and build a scalable and efficient data pipeline', 'Explore and pioneer novel technical solutions in the healthcare space. Most of this hasn’t been done before, so you’ll be uniquely positioned to pave the way', '3+ years of software engineering experience with a clear understanding of industry best practices', 'Proficiency in SQL and at least two commonly used programming languages, such as Python, JavaScript, Go, Java, or Scala']

['', ' You have an interesting background and I wanted to tell you about our open position.\xa0A highly innovative and fast growing ML and computer vision startup helping with safety issues in the world of autonomous vehicles seeks a Lead Software Engineer to work on their Data Platform and manage. This role is remote until Boston area offices can safely open', ' - Oversee & provide tech guidance on efforts related to the collection, management, processing, & security of data', ' ', ' - Proven track record planning and delivering on development milestones aligned with business goals', ' - skill in finance is preferred, not required\xa0', ' -\xa0startup experience ', ' - Experience or familiarity with big data', 'Requirements:', ' - Both on-prem and cloud-based data storage and processing', ' - Define & deliver on a roadmap that will prepare our platform for increasing data volume & new ML efforts as we expand ', ' If you feel this can be a close fit please let me know good times to speak, ideally today or tmrw as this role is coming fast!', ' Must be USC or GC', ' -\xa0Amazon Web Services (EC2, S3, and RDS) ', '- Must be USC/GC and must be local to Boston. ', ' - Coordinate with data scientists, machine learning engineers & other stakeholders to ensure that our data infrastructure evolves w the org', ' - Workload orchestration (e.g. Kubernetes, Airflow, Nextflow)', ' - Lead & develop a small, growing team of engineers', ' - Proven familiarity with best practices surrounding data security', '\xa0\xa0Experience with:', '- startup experience strongly preferred, not required\xa0', ' - 5+ years commercial software dev using Python', ' - management experience ', '- this person will be focused on big data, not machine learning (although that is a company focus). big data experience strongly preferred', ' - Relational databases (we use PostgreSQL)', '- office is in Downtown Boston\xa0', ' - Containerization (e.g. Docker)', ' - Experience developing data pipeline for a machine learning', ' Preferred:', 'Salary + equity and full benefits', ' Responsibilities', '- interpersonal skills are key, since ideally this person will manage two less Sr workers', '- remote for now and on-site once offices open (no rush)', ' Requirements:', ' - Solid software design skills with experience writing well-tested and scalable code']

job_title: Backend Software Engineer - Data (Remote or Pittsburgh)
job_text: ['Above & Beyond:', 'Complex data modeling and messaging systems experience', 'Web socket and/or UNIX socket programming experience', 'Seegrid is embracing a remote workforce, so this position can be remotely located anywhere in the US or at HQ in Pittsburgh, PA.\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', 'Participate in all phases of the development process:\xa0planning, construction, and testingPerform code review and provide meaningful feedback to your peersDemonstrate problem-solving & technical innovationShare knowledge with peers by writing design documents, giving tech talks, documenting code, collaborating on process improvements, etc.Work closely with product management and service teams to deliver great products', 'Experience working with any set of the following:\xa0distributed systems, non-relational databases, relational databases, asynchronous programming paradigms, real-time messaging systems (AMQP, MQTT, WSS), REST web services, Slack apps', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, or similar field of study or equivalent practical experienceHands-on programming experience, especially in PythonExperience working with any set of the following:\xa0distributed systems, non-relational databases, relational databases, asynchronous programming paradigms, real-time messaging systems (AMQP, MQTT, WSS), REST web services, Slack appsAbility to clearly explain and communicate complex technical topics", 'Seegrid is the leading provider of self-driving industrial vehicles and user-friendly, enterprise software solutions. We are seeking energetic, bright, and friendly people to help achieve our vision: to fortify global supply chains and create profitable economies with safe, seamless, and smart mobile robotics solutions. Today, Seegrid accelerates Industry 4.0 for the world’s largest brands. Global leaders in manufacturing, distribution, and e-commerce fulfillment rely on Seegrid’s full suite of solutions and services, including vision-guided vehicles, fleet management software, actionable analytics, and best-in-class service and support. Our unique and proven technology sets us apart—our automation solutions have safely driven millions of autonomous miles in real production facilities without a single personnel safety incident. Are you ready to transform the future?', 'Our company is headquartered in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.', 'About the Role:', 'Perform code review and provide meaningful feedback to your peers', 'Ability to clearly explain and communicate complex technical topics', 'Seegrid is an equal opportunity employer Minorities/Females/People with Disabilities/Protected Veterans/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity.', 'Hands-on programming experience, especially in Python', 'Complex data modeling and messaging systems experienceInformation security & data managementWeb socket and/or UNIX socket programming experienceExperience with:\xa0ElasticSearch, Logstash, Kibana, time-series databases', 'Share knowledge with peers by writing design documents, giving tech talks, documenting code, collaborating on process improvements, etc.', 'Information security & data management', 'As a Backend Software Engineer at Seegrid, you will work in a tightly knit development team to create the next generation of warehouse automation robots and control systems. You’ll work with customers, product management, and other engineers to conceive, design, and implement new features, maintain existing code and debug the complex, multi-factored issues that arise when robots, humans, and the unconstrained real-world interact.', 'Qualifications:\xa0', 'All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, or disability status.', 'Demonstrate problem-solving & technical innovation', 'Experience with:\xa0ElasticSearch, Logstash, Kibana, time-series databases', 'Work closely with product management and service teams to deliver great products', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, or similar field of study or equivalent practical experience", 'Participate in all phases of the development process:\xa0planning, construction, and testing']

['B.S. degree or higher in Computer Science or other technical discipline, or related practical experience2+ years hands-on software development experience, with the most recent experience preferably in cloud/SaaS environment and enterprise scale application development.C#, ASP.NET MVC, or Java experience.Expertise and hands-on experience with web services (e.g. REST, SOAP).\xa0Experience with Javascript, CSS, HTML.Proficient understanding of SQL and relationship databases.Working experience with Azure and/or AWS a plus.Working experience with Active Directory and/or LDAP a plus.Knowledge and experience with authentication standards such as SAML, WS-Fed, OpenId or OAuth a plus.Solid understanding of security and networking implementation and best practices.Familiarity with general software development release lifecycle, source code management and defect management methodologies.Demonstrate ability to complete highly detailed tasks with strict attention to detail, quality and timeliness. Strong organizational and self-management skills.Excellent analytical and troubleshooting skills.Excellent oral and written communication skills.', '', 'B.S. degree or higher in Computer Science or other technical discipline, or related practical experience', 'Interface with Support to handle customer escalation issues.\xa0', 'Solid understanding of security and networking implementation and best practices.', 'Excellent oral and written communication skills.', 'Working experience with Azure and/or AWS a plus.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Contribute to feature design and implementation to bring the product to the next level.Participate in continuous and iterative engineering cycles with emphasis on code quality, supportability, scalability and performance.\xa0Develop unit test cases and perform comprehensive unit testing.Diagnose and fix product issues found internally or in the field.Interface with Support to handle customer escalation issues.\xa0', 'Requirements:', 'Develop unit test cases and perform comprehensive unit testing.', 'CyberArk, the global leader in privileged access management, helps organizations transform their business through improved security and reduced risk. As a trusted partner for thousands of companies around the world, CyberArk consistently sets the bar – driving innovation and helping our customers stay one step ahead of attackers.', 'Participate in continuous and iterative engineering cycles with emphasis on code quality, supportability, scalability and performance.\xa0', 'Recruiting agencies or vendors without a valid agreement between the parties are not authorized to (a) send CyberArk unsolicited resumes or candidate data or (b) contact CyberArk employees for the purposes of presenting candidates for employment. CyberArk will only work with recruiting agencies who have a valid agreement with CyberArk and that are specifically invited by CyberArk’s recruiting team to assist with searching for and submitting candidates for a specific position. Any unsolicited resumes or other candidate data submitted to CyberArk will not be accepted and shall be considered CyberArk’s property. CyberArk will not pay any placement or other fees of any kind for any unsolicited resumes or candidate data that is submitted in violation of this policy. CyberArk does not accept liability under any legal theory such as course of conduct, oral agreements, implied contracts, or otherwise based on negotiations with a candidate identified from an unsolicited resume or data in violation of this policy.', 'Demonstrate ability to complete highly detailed tasks with strict attention to detail, quality and timeliness. Strong organizational and self-management skills.', 'Experience with Javascript, CSS, HTML.', 'You must be an energetic self-starter with a desire to learn new things quickly.\xa0In this position, you will work in a team of talented engineers to innovate, implement, and support IDaptive Application Services.', 'Expertise and hands-on experience with web services (e.g. REST, SOAP).\xa0', 'About CyberArk:', 'Proficient understanding of SQL and relationship databases.', 'Working experience with Active Directory and/or LDAP a plus.', 'IDaptive is CyberArk’s primary core product to support its Cloud infrastructure as well as to provide solutions for IDaas, SaaS, and Endpoint management.', 'Knowledge and experience with authentication standards such as SAML, WS-Fed, OpenId or OAuth a plus.', 'C#, ASP.NET MVC, or Java experience.', 'Familiarity with general software development release lifecycle, source code management and defect management methodologies.', 'Diagnose and fix product issues found internally or in the field.', '\xa0', 'Contribute to feature design and implementation to bring the product to the next level.', '2+ years hands-on software development experience, with the most recent experience preferably in cloud/SaaS environment and enterprise scale application development.', 'Excellent analytical and troubleshooting skills.', 'CyberArk is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, creed, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or protected Veteran status.', 'Job Description:']

job_title: Staff Data Scientist - League Data Central, Gameplay
job_text: ['', 'Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience', 'Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL', 'Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers', '.', 'Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches', 'Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience ', '===', 'Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing)', ' Experience with elo rating or similar ranking and match-making systems Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop) Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP) Experience working in an Agile environment ', ' Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing) Stakeholder management skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization', 'Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs', 'Experience with elo rating or similar ranking and match-making systems', 'Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP)', 'Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices', 'Staff Data Scientist on the League Data Central team', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. Riot Games makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters and does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, criminal history, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law, including the City of Los Angeles’ Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance relating to an applicant's criminal history (LAMC 189.00).", 'Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game', 'Our Perks', 'Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization', 'Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria', 'Stakeholder management skills. ['About This Featured Opportunity', 'Calling all AI/ML Data Engineers!!About This Featured OpportunityOur top tech client is looking for an AI/ML Engineer to join their Customer Systems Engineering Organization. This team sits in Sunnyvale, CA, so a candidate in the area or willing to relocate would be preferred. You will get to work alongside a group of experienced Ph.D. applied scientists and data engineers with strong passion to leverage and develop cutting-edge machine learning solutions that solve a diverse set of real world problems, and impact millions of users and billions of devices worldwide.Must Haves Excellent knowledge and good practical skills in major ML algorithms as applied to Natural Language Processing, information retrieval, data mining. Deep understanding of Python, CUDA or other GPGPU is a plus. Practical experience with deep learning based solutions highly valued. Passion for continuing to learn state-of-the-art techniques in ML/Data science Experience leveraging Jupyter Notebooks Disclaimer: We are unable to work on a Corp to Corp basis for this opportunity. However, ADVANTIS Global Inc. is able to provide sponsorship for employment visa status (e.g., H-1B visa status)!', 'Experience leveraging Jupyter Notebooks', 'Passion for continuing to learn state-of-the-art techniques in ML/Data science', 'Must Haves', 'Practical experience with deep learning based solutions highly valued.', ' Excellent knowledge and good practical skills in major ML algorithms as applied to Natural Language Processing, information retrieval, data mining. Deep understanding of Python, CUDA or other GPGPU is a plus. Practical experience with deep learning based solutions highly valued. Passion for continuing to learn state-of-the-art techniques in ML/Data science Experience leveraging Jupyter Notebooks ', 'Excellent knowledge and good practical skills in major ML algorithms as applied to Natural Language Processing, information retrieval, data mining.', 'Deep understanding of Python, CUDA or other GPGPU is a plus.']

['', "-\tBachelor's degree and 5 years or more related experience; Masters and 3 years or more related experience.", '-\tRelational database experience with an understanding of SQL.', 'About Qwaltec', '-\tCoordinate with NASA Integration and Test (I&T) engineers to understand developments during spacecraft assembly.', ' ', '-\tMust be able to pass a Government background investigation and clearance, requiring US citizenship.', '-\tBe able to do shift work during mission.', 'Qwaltec is a Women-Owned Small Business (WOSB) that specializes in space systems operations. We provide expertise in operations and engineering, mission readiness, technical training, and systems engineering for satellite mission control centers. Our vision is to make a difference on and off the planet, by focusing as much on our customers and team members as we do on the mission. We strive for excellence and accountability, and we do everything we can to exceed expectations while acting with integrity and compassion. We invest in relationships, and we value openness, honesty, and fairness in all our endeavors. ', '-\tSupport other duties as assigned.', '-\tProvide support during database installation and testing of post deployment checkout.', '-\tBecome the Subject Matter Expert (SME) on the verification and validation of satellite databases to support the Flight Operation Team (FOT).', 'Qwaltec is seeking a Satellite Database Engineer on the NASA GSMO II contract in support of the On-Orbit Servicing, Assembly and Manufacturing mission 1 (OSAM-1) program at NASA Goddard Space Flight Center (GSFC). The position is located in Greenbelt, MD.', '-\tSpacecraft subsystems experience in operations or I&T.', 'An Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer, Qwaltec is committed to hiring a diverse and talented workforce. For more information, visit qwaltec.com.', '-\tSupport the FOT throughout mission.', '-\tSupport the FOT in meetings with vendors with regards to database contents. This includes coordinating with spacecraft, instrument, and ground system vendors.', '-\tMS Office skills required.', 'Primary responsibilities include the following:', '-\tSupport the development of database-related software tools.', 'The OSAM-1 mission is a Goddard Space Flight Center Exploration and In-Space Services (NExIS) Projects Division managed mission. OSAM-1 is a robotic servicing mission designed to refuel a Low Earth Orbit (LEO) satellite. It contains 3 elements: the Flight Element comprised of the OSAM-1 Servicing Vehicle (RSV) and development testbeds, the Ground Element comprised of the systems required to conduct satellite operations and their supporting networks and facilities, and the Launch Element comprised of the Launch Vehicle and supporting facilities and services. NExIS is responsible for the design, engineering, development, test and operations of the OSAM-1 Mission through an integrated team at GSFC. The Servicing Payload design, development and RSV integration will be conducted at GSFC.', '-\tInterface with other spacecraft Subsystem SMEs as well as Spacecraft and Instrument SMEs for database feedback.', 'PM20', '-\tHave a basic knowledge of cloud infrastructure. ', '-\tPrevious experience/proficiency with tools/languages such as XML, Perl, etc.']

job_title: Principal Data Engineer | AWS, Streaming | Top 5 Hedge Fund in Boston
job_text: ['', 'BS or equivalent degree', 'Required Qualifications:\xa0', 'Act as a critical thought leader, consulting and mentoring other teams as your new systems transform the way this entire firm leverages data', 'Define the future of high-performance trading systems:\xa0', 'Expertise with Python, Spark, and Hadoop', 'Casual dress, collaborative teams, and work from home flexibility', 'Introduce and evaluate cutting edge Big Data, HPC, and Cloud technologies to build critical, highly complex distributed system from scratch', 'Extremely competitive employee benefits program, 401K, and compensation packageOne of the best-rated work cultures and work/life balances in the businessCasual dress, collaborative teams, and work from home flexibility', 'Experience working in Financial Services, ideally supporting performance sensitive trading systems', 'Capitalize on:', 'Required Qualifications:\xa0\xa0', 'In this role, you will architect and implement AWS, Big Data, and streaming solutions to massively increase the scale of data that the quantitative research, analytics, and trading teams are able to leverage. This team has already identified AWS, Big Data, and HPC technologies to build their initial POCs, but you will be asked to introduce new technologies as development progresses.', 'BS or equivalent degree8+ years of hands-on software development or data engineering experienceSignificant expertise with multiple AWS services (Kinesis, Lambda, EMR, Glue, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch Service, Redshift, Athena, QuickSight, etc.)Expertise with Python, Spark, and Hadoop', 'Lead the migration to AWS as a hands-on technical leader', "One of Boston's top Hedge Funds has had an elite track record of success over the past 4.5 years; they have doubled their AUM, and now have $100+ Billion in AUM. They are building out a new cloud team to redefine the scope and performance of their data processing systems and infrastructure. This team will work in a greenfield environment, designing brand new systems from scratch.", 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Significant expertise with multiple AWS services (Kinesis, Lambda, EMR, Glue, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch Service, Redshift, Athena, QuickSight, etc.)', 'Extremely competitive employee benefits program, 401K, and compensation package', 'One of the best-rated work cultures and work/life balances in the business', '\xa0', 'Introduce and evaluate cutting edge Big Data, HPC, and Cloud technologies to build critical, highly complex distributed system from scratchLead the migration to AWS as a hands-on technical leaderAct as a critical thought leader, consulting and mentoring other teams as your new systems transform the way this entire firm leverages data', '8+ years of hands-on software development or data engineering experience', 'Define the future of high-performance trading systems:\xa0\xa0', 'Principal Data Engineer | AWS, Streaming | Top 5 Hedge Fund in Boston']

['', 'Preferred – Direct knowledge of F5 Load Balancer', 'CAMP’s relationships with business aircraft manufacturers, aircraft maintenance facilities, and parts suppliers place it in a unique position to understand how current offline information flows in the business aviation industry to introduce friction to the global market for business aviation parts and services. CAMP is building a digital business that will streamline the exchange of parts and services and create substantial value for both CAMP and the aviation industry at large.', 'Provide 2nd and 3rd level support', 'Preferred – Direct knowledge of Veritas backup solutions', 'CAMP is an exciting company to work for, not only because of its future growth prospects, but also because of its culture. Smart, motivated people, who want to take initiative, are given the opportunity and freedom to make things happen. CAMP is part of the Hearst Business Media portfolio.', 'CAMP Systems is the leading provider of aircraft compliance and health management services to the global business aviation industry. CAMP is the pre-eminent brand in its industry and is the exclusive recommended service provider for nearly all business aircraft manufacturers in the world. Our services are delivered through a “SaaS plus” model and we support over 20,000 aircraft on our maintenance tracking platform and over 31,000 engines on our engine health monitoring platform. Additionally, CAMP provides shop floor management ERP systems to over 1,300 aircraft maintenance facilities and parts suppliers around the world. CAMP has grown from a single location company in 2001, to over 1,000 employees in 13 locations around the world.', 'Experience with Microsoft Active Directory', 'Preferred – Cloud experience, preferably in AWS or Azure', 'Monitor and test application performance for potential bottlenecks, identify possible solutions, and work with developers to implement those fixes', 'Responsibilities:', 'Requirements', 'Participate in the design of information and operational support systems', 'Inventory Locator Service (ILS), a division of CAMP has helped customers by collecting data about parts available in the marketplace and organizing them into one user-friendly database. The new and used parts locator service developed by ILS has helped numerous customers in the aviation, marine, and defense sectors find the parts they need, streamline procurement, sell their parts inventory, improve their MRO services, and automate their supply chain operations.', 'Work in a team environment to provide 24x7 support of the production infrastructure', 'CI/CD experience a plus', 'Experience with networking equipment and infrastructure (Cisco, F5, RSA)', 'This is an exciting new venture and a unique opportunity to contribute to and be a part of building a completely new business that is incubated within a large, stable, mature company.', '5+ years of experience', 'ILS (a CAMP Systems Company), is in search of an experienced Systems Engineer to manage and monitor all installed systems and infrastructure. Ideally, you are a natural born problem solver, someone who is very hands on and not afraid to jump in and trouble-shoot for a client/customer if need be! job_title: Software Engineer (Distributed Systems) - Product Insights and Experimentation
job_text: ['', 'What You’ll Be Doing', 'Company Description', 'Develop complex and highly scaled data processing pipelines in both batch and streaming contexts. Ship new features, improve reliability and correctness, and resolve performance bottlenecks.', 'Drive “Experimentation Culture” at Twitter. Be a part of leveling up experimentation and causal inference culture at Twitter.', 'Participate in all phases of software development from architecture/design through implementation, testing, and on-call.', 'Work closely with Experimentation Data Science team to implement sophisticated statistical methodology into the platform/pipelines.', 'Work with cutting-edge technology like Druid, Presto, Dataflow and BigQuery to power Twitter’s metrics and experimentation dashboards.', 'Job Description', 'Develop complex and highly scaled data processing pipelines in both batch and streaming contexts. Ship new features, improve reliability and correctness, and resolve performance bottlenecks.Work with cutting-edge technology like Druid, Presto, Dataflow and BigQuery to power Twitter’s metrics and experimentation dashboards.Participate in all phases of software development from architecture/design through implementation, testing, and on-call.Work closely with Experimentation Data Science team to implement sophisticated statistical methodology into the platform/pipelines.Drive “Experimentation Culture” at Twitter. Be a part of leveling up experimentation and causal inference culture at Twitter.']

Master's degree in similar disciplines with a minimum of 1 year of related experience; or PhD in similar disciplines.", '.', 'Develop subsystem requirements and perform analysis on a wide variety of large and disparate datasets using complex techniques.', 'Experience in writing proposals, task plans, and research publications for peer reviewed forums.', 'Design and develop complete components of software tools for data analytics.', 'Hands on experience in automation and analysis systems for robotic autonomous systems.', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Hands on experience in automation and analysis systems for robotic autonomous systems.Extensive knowledge of applicable industry and/or academic practices and standards in Software design & development and Computer Science.Experience in interdisciplinary team leadership.Experience in writing proposals, task plans, and research publications for peer reviewed forums.', 'Communicate results to internal customers.', 'What You Will Tackle', 'Extensive knowledge of applicable industry and/or academic practices and standards in Software design & development and Computer Science.', 'Apply and combine current and emerging techniques and tools in novel ways.', 'Experience in interdisciplinary team leadership.', 'Develop scheduling algorithms for autonomous systems that must interpret large amounts of input state, constraint, and event data to generate actions and scheduled to achieve higher level goals.', 'Active TS/SCI clearance is required for this position.', 'Broad knowledge in one or more related fields of the following areas: software development, artificial intelligence, operations research, resource allocation mechanisms, quantitative modeling, machine learning, computer vision, risk models and probabilistic methods.', "Typically requires a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related discipline with a minimum of 3 years of related experience; job_title: Software Engineer II – Robotic Process Automation (RPA)
job_text: ['', 'Team up with designers, testers, and product managers to find the best solutions for our customers', ' Automate Everything. Help us transform the way we do work by automating manual processes, adding reliability, saving time, and freeing up your teammates to do more valuable work. Continuously learn modern software design and development core practices, utilizing articles, MeetUps, conferences, tech talks, etc. Review and discuss code with engineering peers and leaders to understand best practices and optimal design patterns Team up with designers, testers, and product managers to find the best solutions for our customers Increase your business acumen by consistently learning about other parts of the business ', 'Qualifications', 'Pay to park or be stuck in a corporate high-rise', 'Past experience implementing Multi-Bot architectures within UiPath is highly desired. ', 'Build and ship high-quality code at a rapid pace', 'A well-rounded development background is strongly desired. Are you familiar with writing or consuming APIs, writing code libraries, or other automation tools and approaches? Great!', 'So, We Will Expect You To', 'Participate in design thinking activities to improve the user experience', 'Our automation ecosystem will be built on the UiPath platform. Experience with UiPath or similar platforms (Blue Prism, Automation Anywhere, etc) is a must.', 'Experience automating Microsoft Outlook and Excel is not required but is highly desired. Additionally, experience with OCR technologies will be a major plus as well.', 'Be pigeonholed into proprietary and stagnant codebases', 'Increase your business acumen by consistently learning about other parts of the business', ' Willingness to speak up and share your opinions and insights. Your experience will be invaluable as we build our RPA Center of Excellence! Our automation ecosystem will be built on the UiPath platform. Experience with UiPath or similar platforms (Blue Prism, Automation Anywhere, etc) is a must. Past experience implementing Multi-Bot architectures within UiPath is highly desired.  As an RPA Engineer, a firm background with .NET development is also a must. Additionally, strong knowledge of relational databases (Oracle, MS SQL Server, etc) is required. Experience with other languages, frameworks, or tools is a plus! Experience automating Microsoft Outlook and Excel is not required but is highly desired. Additionally, experience with OCR technologies will be a major plus as well. A well-rounded development background is strongly desired. Are you familiar with writing or consuming APIs, writing code libraries, or other automation tools and approaches? Great! ', 'Description', 'Work in a silo', 'As an RPA Engineer, a firm background with .NET development is also a must. Additionally, strong knowledge of relational databases (Oracle, MS SQL Server, etc) is required. Experience with other languages, frameworks, or tools is a plus!', 'Work with open source tools to build new technologies', 'Automate Everything. Help us transform the way we do work by automating manual processes, adding reliability, saving time, and freeing up your teammates to do more valuable work.', 'Willingness to speak up and share your opinions and insights. Your experience will be invaluable as we build our RPA Center of Excellence!', ' Bring at least 2 years of experience to the table Work collaboratively with designers, product managers, and engineers Leverage cutting-edge technologies and modern practices Build and ship high-quality code at a rapid pace Work with open source tools to build new technologies Participate in design thinking activities to improve the user experience Work with great people at our sprawling Pittsburgh campus that includes sports leagues, a world-class health club, and a dynamic culture ', 'Be limited by project plans', 'Work collaboratively with designers, product managers, and engineers', 'We believe that there is always a better way.', 'Apply today!', 'At DICK’s You Won’t', ' Work in a silo Be limited by project plans Find yourself stuck in a boring cube Pay to park or be stuck in a corporate high-rise Be pigeonholed into proprietary and stagnant codebases ', 'Work with great people at our sprawling Pittsburgh campus that includes sports leagues, a world-class health club, and a dynamic culture', 'Lastly, here’s some stuff that won’t be part of your day-to-day.', 'Experience', 'If you’re excited about joining the DSG team, we’d love to meet you.', 'Find yourself stuck in a boring cube', 'Bring at least 2 years of experience to the table', 'As an Engineer at DICK’s you will:', 'Leverage cutting-edge technologies and modern practices', 'Continuously learn modern software design and development core practices, utilizing articles, MeetUps, conferences, tech talks, etc.', 'Review and discuss code with engineering peers and leaders to understand best practices and optimal design patterns']

['', 'Solid core CS fundamentals (data structures, algorithms, architecting systems).', 'Become an expert in Clojure, Go, and the many other cutting-edge open source technologies that maximize our development velocity.', 'B.S. or higher in Computer Science (or equivalent work experience).', 'Excited to work on large scale data stores and distributed systems.', 'Across our engineering teams, we offer a wide range of opportunities for different skill levels and experiences.', "Have end-to-end ownership of Liftoff's backend components, including distributed data stores, data processing pipelines, and high-performance front end servers.Ship code multiple times a day, and within seconds see its quantified impact on millions of users and our business's revenue.Be part of an “engineering excellence” culture through state-of-the-art tools, risk-driven testing, explainable systems, and code review.Become an expert in Clojure, Go, and the many other cutting-edge open source technologies that maximize our development velocity.Join a nimble, consistently excellent, and experienced engineering team (former Google/LI/Ooyala/etc).", 'Very strong coding ability.Solid core CS fundamentals (data structures, algorithms, architecting systems).An incredible desire for quality and perfection, and the ability to temper it when necessary to ship.Sets ego aside in pursuit of finding the best solution, no matter where it comes from.Self-motivated and a great ability to hustle.Excited to work on large scale data stores and distributed systems.B.S. or higher in Computer Science (or equivalent work experience).4+ years software engineering experience.Experience building large distributed systems or backend architectures.A healthy sense of fun!', "At Liftoff, we’re solving one of the core problems faced by every mobile app: growth. To do so, we build Machine Learning and Big Data-driven technology that can accurately predict which apps a user will like, and connect them in a compelling way. Our systems operate at a scale unseen outside of the largest Internet companies -- processing over a million requests per second and interacting with over a billion users. Our technology is innovative and we have strong product-market fit; as a result, we've already reached profitability and are seeing tremendous growth.", 'Join a nimble, consistently excellent, and experienced engineering team (former Google/LI/Ooyala/etc).', 'Experience building large distributed systems or backend architectures.', 'Self-motivated and a great ability to hustle.', 'Sets ego aside in pursuit of finding the best solution, no matter where it comes from.', '4+ years software engineering experience.', 'A healthy sense of fun!', 'Be part of an “engineering excellence” culture through state-of-the-art tools, risk-driven testing, explainable systems, and code review.', "Ship code multiple times a day, and within seconds see its quantified impact on millions of users and our business's revenue.", "Have end-to-end ownership of Liftoff's backend components, including distributed data stores, data processing pipelines, and high-performance front end servers.", '\xa0', '\ufeffDesired qualities and experiences:', 'Very strong coding ability.', 'An incredible desire for quality and perfection, and the ability to temper it when necessary to ship.', 'As a Backend Software Engineer at Liftoff, you will:', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. Come join our team and help us shape the future of mobile growth!']

['', " You believe that the best work comes from a team that’s unified in their mission - you prioritize getting everyone on the same page, and take pride that your teammates all feel the ownership and hunger to create the best experience for our users. Being user-centric as the first principle: whether it’s property managers, leasing agents, renters or fellow apartment listers, you can articulate the pain points of data's customers - you thrive on crafting insights from qualitative and quantitative research, and then brainstorming solutions with the team. Excellence is important to you - you want to be amongst kind, passionate people who push each other to be better. ", 'An exceptional team: our hiring bar is high and your colleagues are talented, motivated, self-starters.', 'Meaningful impact: Homes are core to all of us - they’re not just a big financial responsibility; homes are a place of safety and shelter, as well as a place where renters can hope to launch their hopes and dreams. Finding a home is a daunting, emotional process, and your work will make a real difference in renters’ lives. ', 'Build processes and policies with organization-wide support that ensures the long term success of your data strategy.', 'Build the roadmap to make data our competitive advantage, identifying where our customers can make better decisions and providing them actionable insights along the way.', 'Self-starter: you and the head of analytics will own the strategy and will define what your own success is.', "Here's what you'll do as the Product Manager for Data:", 'Partner with product teams to collect data in a clean and actionable manner, helping them define how to best structure their dashboards and reporting needs.', '2-5 years of experience in product management working on data products or as a Product Analyst or Data Engineer with some Product Management experience.', 'Massive impact and visibility: You’ll have a ton of visibility at all levels of the company. You will be helping everyone from the sales people making better use of data during their pitch to the CEO being more impactful with the right use of data.', 'Work with data engineering and analytics teams to deliver a best in class data infrastructure that yields timely, accurate and actionable insights for all internal and external consumers.', ' 2-5 years of experience in product management working on data products or as a Product Analyst or Data Engineer with some Product Management experience. Self-starter: you and the head of analytics will own the strategy and will define what your own success is. Knowledge of data pipeline design and previous experience developing or upgrading an internal Data infrastructure. Track record of building excitement about internal infrastructure projects and launching on time. Analytically and technically fluent - you can spend hours discussing architecture trade-offs with senior engineers while understanding the analytics implications. ', 'Analytically and technically fluent - you can spend hours discussing architecture trade-offs with senior engineers while understanding the analytics implications.', 'Evangelize what the future of our data-driven organization looks like to the entire company and build excitement behind your vision.', "Here's What’s In It For You", "Being user-centric as the first principle: whether it’s property managers, leasing agents, renters or fellow apartment listers, you can articulate the pain points of data's customers - you thrive on crafting insights from qualitative and quantitative research, and then brainstorming solutions with the team.", "Here are the skills and experience you'll need to be successful:", 'What You Believe / Stand For', ' Build the roadmap to make data our competitive advantage, identifying where our customers can make better decisions and providing them actionable insights along the way. Work with data engineering and analytics teams to deliver a best in class data infrastructure that yields timely, accurate and actionable insights for all internal and external consumers. Build processes and policies with organization-wide support that ensures the long term success of your data strategy. Evangelize what the future of our data-driven organization looks like to the entire company and build excitement behind your vision. Partner with product teams to collect data in a clean and actionable manner, helping them define how to best structure their dashboards and reporting needs. ', 'Excellence is important to you - you want to be amongst kind, passionate people who push each other to be better.', 'Career development: We’re always growing, and will expect your scope & responsibilities to grow alongside your impact.', ' Massive impact and visibility: You’ll have a ton of visibility at all levels of the company. You will be helping everyone from the sales people making better use of data during their pitch to the CEO being more impactful with the right use of data. Career development: We’re always growing, and will expect your scope & responsibilities to grow alongside your impact. An exceptional team: our hiring bar is high and your colleagues are talented, motivated, self-starters. Meaningful impact: Homes are core to all of us - they’re not just a big financial responsibility; homes are a place of safety and shelter, as well as a place where renters can hope to launch their hopes and dreams. Finding a home is a daunting, emotional process, and your work will make a real difference in renters’ lives.  ', 'Knowledge of data pipeline design and previous experience developing or upgrading an internal Data infrastructure.', 'You believe that the best work comes from a team that’s unified in their mission - you prioritize getting everyone on the same page, and take pride that your teammates all feel the ownership and hunger to create the best experience for our users.', 'Track record of building excitement about internal infrastructure projects and launching on time.']

['', 'Your Superpowers', 'The Impact You’ll Have', 'You are fluent in python (strongly preferred) or R and cloud native data science from data extraction and organization to code sharing.', 'You are empathetic with end users; proficient at turning business and scientific questions into testable, clean, and reproducible data scientific workflows.', 'You have significant experience building and implementing deep learning models and matching network architecture and inductive biases to the problem to be solved.', 'You have a quick, flexible mind, able to rapidly learn new fields and use data science and machine learning to improve decision making and workflows.', 'You have a PhD (preferred) or Masters in a quantitative scientific field such as physics, computational biology, chemistry, engineering, etc.You have8+ years of experience in data science in industry.You are fluent in python (strongly preferred) or R and cloud native data science from data extraction and organization to code sharing.You have experience in cheminformatics and computational chemistry (eg similarity searching, SAR modeling, molecular generation, compound-protein modeling) and the adaptation of modern machine learning tools to key problems in chemistry, biology, and drug designYou have an excellent understanding of machine learning from a principles-centric perspective; focused on mapping the analysis technique to the problem.You have significant experience building and implementing deep learning models and matching network architecture and inductive biases to the problem to be solved.You are an excellent communicator, able to translate complex analyses into insightful visuals and presentations for audiences with a wide range of technical backgrounds.', 'You will help to radically lower drug prices and expand access, by integrating modern computational techniques for molecular generation and optimization into a rapid, state of the art drug development process. You will drive the adoption of machine learning for the improvement of human health in building a radically different, digital-native and data-first life sciences company, where we bootstrap our way to rapid increases in scale and efficacy across functions. You will enable experts across EQRx to see further, connecting data from biology and chemistry, to the clinic and patients, powering a novel, modern paradigm in drug development.', 'You have a PhD (preferred) or Masters in a quantitative scientific field such as physics, computational biology, chemistry, engineering, etc.', 'Job Code: ', 'You have experience in cheminformatics and computational chemistry (eg similarity searching, SAR modeling, molecular generation, compound-protein modeling) and the adaptation of modern machine learning tools to key problems in chemistry, biology, and drug design', 'EQRx is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'You have an excellent understanding of machine learning from a principles-centric perspective; focused on mapping the analysis technique to the problem.', 'You are empathetic with end users; proficient at turning business and scientific questions into testable, clean, and reproducible data scientific workflows.You have a quick, flexible mind, able to rapidly learn new fields and use data science and machine learning to improve decision making and workflows.You are an avid reader of the literature; excited to try novel tools and techniques to solve problems.Job Code: ', 'You have8+ years of experience in data science in industry.', 'You are an avid reader of the literature; excited to try novel tools and techniques to solve problems.', 'You are an excellent communicator, able to translate complex analyses into insightful visuals and presentations for audiences with a wide range of technical backgrounds.']

['', '\ufeffThe Perks!', 'Knowledge and experience in statistical and data mining techniques: GLM/Regression, Random Forest, Boosting, Trees, text mining, social network analysis, etc.', 'Food All Day:\xa0Fully stocked refrigerator, and lunch provided everyday!', 'Build and deploy models that enable marketers to allocate budgets to various channels in order to drive cross-channel optimization by product and by business objectives.', 'Health, Dental & Vision Insurance:\xa0Your health is number 1, so we offer 100% company-paid health, dental, and vision insurance starting on day 1, \u200bwith additional plan options available with minimal employee contribution.', 'We’re looking for someone with 5-7 years of experience manipulating data sets and building statistical models, has a Master’s or PHD in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science or another quantitative field, and is familiar with cloud software/tools in GCP.', 'Responsibilities:', 'ABOUT MADHIVE:', "MadHive is an end-to-end advertising solution that leverages cryptography, blockchain and AI to power modern media. MadHive's advertising suite provides tools for audience forecasting, precision targeting and activation, and cross-screen attribution against its proprietary OTT-first device graph. Customers include advertisers that leverage MadHive's next-generation cryptography to prevent fraud and increase margins, and broadcast giants that leverage the platform to power their digital TV offerings.", 'Self-starter, and unafraid of ambiguous goals, worked or have experience in a start-up like organization, where structure is continuously defined and valued\xa0Self-motivated and able to take initiative without needing a high level of supervisionExperience visualizing/presenting data for stakeholders using: Business Objects, D3, ggplot,\xa0etc.', 'Unlimited Vacation:\xa0We offer Unlimited PTO, plus additional paid company holidays.', 'Parental Leave:\xa0We believe that family comes first, so we provide parental leave to all new parents.\xa0', 'Provide insights and suggestions on customer campaign optimization problems and product/platform optimization problems through statistical data analysis when needed.', 'Experience using statistical computer languages ( Python, SQL.) to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets.', 'The key goal for this person will be to apply modeling techniques relevant to media mix modeling (MMM) optimization and multi-touch attribution (MTA) to our marketing efforts to connect the impact of marketing activities on business outcomes.', 'Develop models that drive personalization for member interactions on owned and paid marketing channels.', 'Commuter Benefits:\xa0Madhive offers Wageworks commuter benefits. Plus, we’re centrally located just a couple blocks from New York City’s Penn Station.\xa0', 'Build prototypes and MVPs of services and applications that improve effectiveness of campaigns, creatives, ad networks and/or user segments.', 'Here are just some of the many benefits of becoming a MadHive employee:', 'Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, decision tree learning, artificial neural networks, etc.) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks.Knowledge\xa0of advanced statistical techniques and concepts (regression, properties of distributions, statistical tests and proper usage, etc.) and experience with applications.', 'MadHive is a dynamic, diverse, innovative and friendly place to work. We embrace our differences and believe they fuel our creativity. We come from varied backgrounds and think that’s important. But whether it’s taking ideas from previous lives and applying them in different ways or creating something completely new, we are all trail-blazing team players who think big and want to make an impact.\xa0', 'Media and advertising experience is a Plus!']

['', 'Design RESTful APIs to meet project requirements.', 'Experience in building software interfacing with relational databases and use of such technologies, including MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, Microsoft SQL, or Aurora.', 'Attend daily stand-ups led by TPM.', 'Expertise with source control tools (Git) and project management tools (Jira).', 'Position Overview\xa0', 'Architect efficient algorithms for production deployment.', 'Familiarity or working knowledge of machine learning tool sets and/or algorithms.', 'Experience using Amazon Web Service capabilities such as S3, Cloudfront, EC2, ECS, EKS and VPC.\xa0', 'About Beyond Limits', 'Experience with at least one (preferably two) of the following programming languages: Python, Go, Scala or Java.\xa0', 'BS or MS in Computer Science or a related degree.', 'Experience with other document and NoSQL database technologies, including Amazon DynamoDB, MongoDB or CouchDB.', 'Strong understanding of engineering best practices – requirement gathering and analysis, design and develop secure and scalable code with unit tests, participate in code reviews and documentation.', 'Experience using Amazon Web Service capabilities such as S3, Cloudfront, EC2, ECS, EKS and VPC.\xa0Experience with other document and NoSQL database technologies, including Amazon DynamoDB, MongoDB or CouchDB.Familiarity or working knowledge of distributed messaging and queue systems.Familiarity or working knowledge of machine learning tool sets and/or algorithms.', 'Prior experience conducting code reviews.', 'Familiarity or working knowledge of distributed messaging and queue systems.', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Minimum\xa0Qualifications', 'Beyond Limits is a pioneering Artificial Intelligence engineering company creating advanced software solutions that go beyond conventional AI. Founded in 2014 with a legacy in space exploration, Beyond Limits is transforming proven technologies from Caltech and NASA’s Jet Propulsion Laboratory into advanced AI solutions, hardened to industrial strength, and put to work for forward-looking companies on earth. We leverage this unparalleled innovation portfolio, along with proprietary cognitive technologies, to help companies solve tough, complex, mission-critical problems and transform their business. We apply a unique hybrid approach to AI, combining numeric AI techniques like machine learning with higher order symbolic AI and expert human knowledge to deliver intuitive cognitive reasoning and information. Our cognitive computing technology mimics human thought processes and provides explainable reasoning to aid human-like decision-making.', 'Job Duties/Responsibilities', 'Beyond Limits is seeking a creative and pioneering Senior Software Engineer to join our Web Platform Services team. This position entails the development of potentially large-scale web and mobile software systems interfacing with cutting-edge A.I. (Artificial Intelligence) technologies. Our senior engineers are also looked to for mentorship of other team members, and to help lead the way in projects in various stages of development.', 'Build scalable web microservices for deployment using Docker and Kubernetes.', 'Design RESTful APIs to meet project requirements.Architect efficient algorithms for production deployment.Build scalable web microservices for deployment using Docker and Kubernetes.Attend daily stand-ups led by TPM.Write clean testable code.', 'Experience in developing web APIs using any framework allowing web-service or RESTful endpoints required.', '6+ years of software design and development experience with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms, and software design.BS or MS in Computer Science or a related degree.Experience with at least one (preferably two) of the following programming languages: Python, Go, Scala or Java.\xa0Expertise with source control tools (Git) and project management tools (Jira).Strong understanding of engineering best practices – requirement gathering and analysis, design and develop secure and scalable code with unit tests, participate in code reviews and documentation.Experience in building software interfacing with relational databases and use of such technologies, including MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, Microsoft SQL, or Aurora.Experience in developing web APIs using any framework allowing web-service or RESTful endpoints required.Prior experience conducting code reviews.', '6+ years of software design and development experience with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms, and software design.', 'Write clean testable code.']

['', 'Summary', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Needs to have worked in Agile, automated code assessment and extremely comfortable with TDD at 100% coverage requirements as well a detailed code reviews by peers', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Comfortable with API interfaces of all kinds: asynchronous queue based, files and the traditional RESTful model', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Role will require extensive use of publish/subscribe, loosely coupled, asynchronous, queue based architectures so use of this is a must', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Open to the fact that D&A is pushing the envelope in areas where the Street has historically not done well in scale and neither has BK.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Needs to act as the engineering lead and mentor for more junior staff – no administrative or\xa0management responsibilities', 'Summary: ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Expert developer in Python, knowledge of Ruby, PHP or others for context', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0The applications team at D&A operates on a distributed basis even in non-pandemic situations, so comfortable with interacting with team members in different time zones, cultural norms and practices', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understands database structure and connectivity with Python – using ORM and other techniques for performant data management', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0World class software engineering is also an art and an engineering discipline, consequently D&A looks for beautiful which is being written for the successors who will end up maintaining it for a decade or two into the future\xa0', 'Description: ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge of languages other than Python, is a plus ', 'We are leveraging our Business Applications to provide clients insights and analytics (e.g., pre/post trade performance and risk, investor analytics, custom indices). For this initiative, we are seeking Full-Stack Software Engineers to join our Scrum teams and focus on creating cloud-based solutions in the AI, Big Data, and Machine Learning space. ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Investment industry knowledge is a plus', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Deep knowledge of securities, classifications, positions and transactions is preferred', 'BNY Mellon Data and Analytics Solutions is a public- and private-cloud-based software and content offering that builds client-centric data, technology, and content capabilities. Operating with the skill and agility of a fintech, Data and Analytics Solutions combines the expertise and resources of the Eagle\xa0product suite, Intermediary Analytics, and other BNY Mellon technology and data assets. Moreover, the division further extends BNY Mellon’s Asset Servicing capabilities in securities and cash into the world’s most important asset class, data.\xa0Data and Analytics Solutions helps firms to analyze their data from different vantage points and transform it into actions that can achieve higher alpha and cheaper beta, with lower costs and less risk. Offering an ecosystem of proprietary and third-party business applications, Data and Analytics Solutions helps firms manage their core investment processes and beyond.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with building compilers or interpreters to support domain specific languages is a plus', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Comprehensive understanding of advanced data structures, linked lists, trees, cyclic direct graphs and the associated algorithms and efficient implementation strategies including representing these structures in relational databases', '*Can be based in NYC, New Jersey, or Wellesley, MA. ']

['', 'Job Summary', 'A conviction is not an absolute bar to employment. Factors such as the age of the offense, evidence of rehabilitation, seriousness of violation, and job relatedness are considered in all employment decisions. Additionally, it’s the bank’s policy to only inquire into a candidate’s criminal history after an offer has been made. ['', 'Working knowledge of BI Tools like Tableau, Looker etc is plus', ' We are looking for a candidate with 8+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role, who has attained a Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field. Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases. Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures and data sets. In depth knowledge of Model and Design of DB schemas for read and write performance. Extensive working knowledge of API or Stream based data extraction processes like Salesforce API and Bulk API is must. Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement. Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management. A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets. Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable ‘big data’ data stores. Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment. Experience with building data pipeline from various business applications like Salesforce, Marketo, NetSuite, Workday etc.  Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, Spark & Kafka Streaming, Python, Scala, Talend etc. Working knowledge of BI Tools like Tableau, Looker etc is plus ', '401k Retirement Plan ', 'Collaboration:', ' Medical, dental, vision 401k Retirement Plan  Unlimited Paid Time Off Gym reimbursement  Employee referral bonus program  Maternity and paternity plans  ', 'Design/Strategy:', 'Experience with building data pipeline from various business applications like Salesforce, Marketo, NetSuite, Workday etc. ', 'A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.', 'Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable ‘big data’ data stores.', 'Gym reimbursement ', 'Employee referral bonus program ', 'Outcomes', 'Maternity and paternity plans ', 'Benefits', 'Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.', 'Analytics: ', 'Mission', 'Unlimited Paid Time Off', 'We are looking for a candidate with 8+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role, who has attained a Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field.', 'Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management.', 'Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, Spark & Kafka Streaming, Python, Scala, Talend etc.', 'Extensive working knowledge of API or Stream based data extraction processes like Salesforce API and Bulk API is must.', 'Medical, dental, vision', 'Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures and data sets. In depth knowledge of Model and Design of DB schemas for read and write performance.', 'Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.', 'Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.', 'Competencies', 'About Databricks']

job_text: ['', ' Proficiency using Python to write automated tests', ' Understanding of PHP, Python and/or Golang from the standpoint of applying automation tests.', ' API and RESTful architecture test automation experience.', ' Own test strategy and execution for one or more feature areas, working closely with the cross-functional team to ensure that we meet our quality objectives', ' Own test strategy and execution for one or more feature areas, working closely with the cross-functional team to ensure that we meet our quality objectives Design complex IT configurations to test product capabilities in simulated production-like environments Perform and participate in all aspects of manual and automated test verifications. Proficiency using Python to write automated tests Understanding of PHP, Python and/or Golang from the standpoint of applying automation tests. API and RESTful architecture test automation experience. Experience in automation and testing of AWS managed services Experience working in a Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) model including Github and CI pipeline automation tools. Intellectual curiosity and a willingness for continual learning. e.g. we mostly use Python today; we may move to other languages in the future. Comfortable working asynchronously on a distributed team. Proactively collaborates with other teams/team members across time zones.', ' Experience working in a Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) model including Github and CI pipeline automation tools.', ' Experience in automation and testing of AWS managed services', ' Perform and participate in all aspects of manual and automated test verifications. This includes feature and functional testing, load, performance, and regression testing', ' Comfortable working asynchronously on a distributed team.']
