['', '• Experience developing systems and general engineering processes and procedures are a plus.', '• Lead Engineering Change Proposal (ECP) pre-approval efforts; proposed technical solution, cost & schedule ROM (including material), and alternate Course of Action analysis', 'Specific Tasks:', '• Experience generating requirements using Model-Based Systems engineering and/or DOORS is preferred.', '• Experience developing requirements for accredited systems is required.', '• Experience as a lead engineer, project engineer, or IPT lead is required.', 'Qualifications/ Requirements:', '• Experience with Verification and Validation requirements.', '• Conduct Trade studies at the direction of Chief Engineer/EPM', '• Excellent oral, written, and presentation skills for interfacing with senior management and customers as well as mentoring other engineers.', 'Our client has an opportunity as a Senior Systems Engineer, the scope of the position requires a proven track record in a lead role in the development of requirements for multi-segment (hardware/software/network) payloads for Airborne Surveillance & Communication Solutions on accredited programs.', '• Function as Lead System Engineer for approved ECPs', '• Active Secret Clearance • Existing TS/SCI (SSBI) security clearance preferred or the ability to satisfy requirements for a TS/SCI (SSBI).', '• Working knowledge in system-level development, requirements definition, analysis, and risk mitigation for complex systems used on accredited programs.', '• Provide Design/Integration Subject Matter Expertise on fielded ISR, Comms, or C2 Systems', '• Minimum of seven years of experience in developing E/0 sensor, communication, and/or radar systems is required.', '\xa0', '• BS in Electrical Engineering, MS preferred.', "This position requires the ability to understand all levels of requirements including direct customer negotiation and flow-down. Candidates must have the ability to work with Design Engineering to develop verification and validation requirements. Experience in the development and ownership of detailed CDRL's (CONOPS, Initialization, etc.) are also required. The ideal candidate will have a strong, multi-discipline technical background and will work directly with internal technical IPT's developing requirements and associated documentation, as well as take a lead role in collaborative requirements development with the customer and prime contractor. The is not a management/supervisor position.", 'Duties/Responsibilities:']

['', 'Description:', 'Please refer to Job 23853 and send attached resume to tim@analyticrecruiting.com', ' - a follow-up call to further discuss the position, your interests and expertise.', 'Leading big data analytics solutions developer seeks an experienced C++ software engineer to join their engineering team in designing and development of their proprietary real-time Iot big data analytics platform.', 'Will develop machine learning and intelligence automated applications for Industrial Iot systems. Focus will be on designing and building reliable/fault tolerant, high performance, large scale distributed systems.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong knowledge and experience of designing and building reliable/fault tolerant, high performance, large scale distributed systems', 'If you are a suitable candidate, you can expect:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Eight plus years software engineering experience', 'Position requirements:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge of Complex Event Processing Engines (CEP) and real-time reactive stream processing systems preferred', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Hands on programming experience in C++ (11+)', ' \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Key Words:\xa0C++, CEP', 'Description: Software Engineer C++, Big Data']

['', 'Networking and multiplayer experience in Unity or UE4 is preferred.', 'A strong preference for experience in implementing machine learning algorithms to include development of training data sets.', 'Excellent communication, problem-solving, debugging and troubleshooting skills to root cause complex issues.', 'Excellent problem solving, troubleshooting and debugging skills.', 'Qualifications', 'Experience with CAD and 3D printing is also desirable.', 'Integrate new hardware and software technology and solutions and build mixed reality content utilizing that technology.', 'Education', 'Work hand-in-hand with product teams, other developers, and key stakeholders.', 'Strong preference for a background with military or law enforcement and the ability to understand the nuances of customer use cases in those industries.', 'Keep pace with coding in a rapidly developing SDK ecosystem and be able to quickly learn and adapt to new operating system features.', 'Experience with Jira, Perforce, and Confluence or similar bug/task tracking and version control software.', 'A strong preference for having shipped applications on an embedded product or having published applications on an app store.', 'Design and implement simulations, input, and UI systems.', 'Responsibilities', 'Research cutting edge technological developments relevant to assigned project challenges and be able to implement externally published research as needed.', 'Experience in graphics and mixed reality development.', " Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or relevant experience in Mixed Reality/AR/VR. ", 'Identify and implement novel solutions to cutting edge mixed reality challenges.', ' Strong experience with 3D development in Unity is required. Experience in graphics and mixed reality development. A strong preference for having shipped applications on an embedded product or having published applications on an app store. Experience with Jira, Perforce, and Confluence or similar bug/task tracking and version control software. Excellent problem solving, troubleshooting and debugging skills. Experience with product coding process, including code management, testing, review. Very strong programming skills - extensive experience with C, C++ or C# Networking and multiplayer experience in Unity or UE4 is preferred. A strong preference for experience in implementing machine learning algorithms to include development of training data sets. Experience with CAD and 3D printing is also desirable. Have and convey a passion for mixed reality and new classes of experiences. Strong preference for a background with military or law enforcement and the ability to understand the nuances of customer use cases in those industries. Excellent communication, problem-solving, debugging and troubleshooting skills to root cause complex issues. ', 'Experience with product coding process, including code management, testing, review.', 'Work primarily in Unity to develop content and applications for mixed reality.', 'Code primarily in C#, with likely work in Python, MagicScript, and/or C++.', 'Job Description', ' Work hand-in-hand with product teams, other developers, and key stakeholders. Identify and implement novel solutions to cutting edge mixed reality challenges. Research cutting edge technological developments relevant to assigned project challenges and be able to implement externally published research as needed. Work primarily in Unity to develop content and applications for mixed reality. Integrate new hardware and software technology and solutions and build mixed reality content utilizing that technology. Design and implement simulations, input, and UI systems. Code primarily in C#, with likely work in Python, MagicScript, and/or C++. Keep pace with coding in a rapidly developing SDK ecosystem and be able to quickly learn and adapt to new operating system features. ', 'Have and convey a passion for mixed reality and new classes of experiences.', "Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or relevant experience in Mixed Reality/AR/VR.", 'Very strong programming skills - extensive experience with C, C++ or C#', 'Strong experience with 3D development in Unity is required.']

['', 'Excellent programming discipline: data structures, complexity analysis, object-oriented principles, design patterns, and unit testing.', 'Responsibilities:\xa0', 'Quicken is excited to be building a team of innovative and talented people that are dedicated to helping people improve their financial lives.\xa0We believe in giving our employees the benefits and perks to keep them happy and healthy.\xa0Whether it’s generous healthcare benefits, a 5% matching 401(k) Plan, a gym subsidy, or unlimited snacks, we believe happy employees are successful employees.\xa0(Benefits and perks may vary based on location.)\xa0Come join our Quicken team!', 'In this role, you will use your strong technical design skills and your passion for contributing broadly to work effectively across the organization. Beyond architectural contributions, you will engage in customer-driven product discussions, as well as strategic decisions. As IFS is a new area for Quicken, you will have the potential to grow your career as upward-mobile opportunities arise. job_title: Remote Software Engineer - Back-End, (Mid - Staff Level)
job_text: ['', 'Researching and proposing new technologies to apply effectively. ', 'We value diversity. At Olo, we know a diverse and inclusive team not only makes our products better, but our workplace better. Many groups are consistently underrepresented across the tech sector and we are fully committed to doing our part to move the needle. ', 'We practice Whole Team Quality, no throwing code over the wall. ', 'Demonstrating broad knowledge of software engineering concepts. ', 'Consistently delivering against commitments. ', 'We learn from and fight through setbacks. We recognize and help one another with direct feedback. ', 'Learn more about our culture, values, and mission.  https://www.olo.com/images/culture.jpg. ', 'We are outcome not output focused. ', 'What You’ll Be Doing', 'Our tech stack is rooted in .NET (C# and F#) and SQL Server running in AWS infrastructure and modern software engineering tools such as GitHub, TeamCity, Octopus Deploy, Datadog, and Sumo Logic, as well as heavy use of OSS ', 'Observing system performance in your domain and identifying emerging problems. ', 'We encourage you to apply! ', 'What’s Important to Olo', 'Our families come first. We know they make us who we are and they are who we live and work for every day. ', 'We foster a culture of collaboration, communication, accountability, skill sharing, belonging, mutual respect, and curiosity. ', 'System Reliability Engineering, Scalability, and Security are embedded throughout our software process. ', 'COVID-19 Impact', 'How We Work', 'Quickly assessing and resolving production incidents that arise in the components your team is responsible for. ', 'We care about you. We offer 20 days of paid time off, fully paid health, dental and vision care premiums, stock options, a generous parental leave plan. ', "Providing constructive criticism in a way that builds the team's bench strength. ", 'Exhibiting good judgment, seeking out diverse perspectives, and challenging business and technical assumptions. ', 'Olo is our extended family. We’re in this together, fighting for one another. We’re happy to be here. We will not let one another down. ', 'Designing reliable, but simple solutions to complex problems at scale. ']

['', 'Job Summary ', ' ', 'Requirements:', 'Interaction:', 'Are you data-driven? \xa0We at NetApp believe in the transformative power of data – to expand customer touchpoints, to foster greater innovation, and to optimize operations. \xa0We are designed for simplicity, optimized to protect, created to embrace future opportunity, and open to enrich choice. \xa0We are the data authority for hybrid cloud, and we are helping our customers realize the full potential of their data.\xa0We’ve built a Data Fabric for a data-driven world – to simplify and integrate data management across the resources that are best for the business. \xa0With the Data Fabric, our customers can harness the power of cloud data services, build cloud infrastructures, and modernize storage through data management. ', 'Responsibilities', 'Sr. Security Software Engineer ', 'Experience in virtual and cloud environments is a strong plus (AWS, Azure, KVM, etc…) Strong C/C++ application development experience. Experience with Linux/FreeBSD development. Understanding of multi-threaded & multi process environments.Familiarity with TCP/IP protocols and networking applications development is a plus. Knowledge of certiﬁcates, encryption, key management or other security related areas is a plus. Strong oral and written communication skills are essential Work collaboratively within a team environment of other engineers to meet aggressive goals and high quality standards Possesses sufﬁcient technical knowledge and experience to pick up new expertise quickly with guidance from a technical leader Strong aptitude for learning new technologies A strong understanding of complex concepts related to computer architecture, data structures and programming practices Ability to estimate work completion required to build an overall predictable plan Follow standard engineering principles and practices Resourceful in applying creative ideas to solve problems ', 'Typically requires a minimum of 12 years of related experience with a Bachelor’s degree; or 8 years and a Master’s degree; or a PhD with 5 years experience; or equivalent experience.', 'Interaction: ', 'Sr. Security Software Engineer', 'This position requires an individual to be creative, enthusiastic, team-oriented, technology savvy, driven to produce results and demonstrate leadership.\xa0Essential Functions: Be part of an Agile development team doing product design, documentation, development, validation and sustaining of software Lead and participate in technical discussions within the team and with other groups across Business Units associated with evaluating and executing design and development plans for products Willingness to work on additional tasks and responsibilities that will contribute towards team, department, and company goals Provide guidance and mentoring to more junior engineers ', 'By modernizing storage through data management, customers can upgrade infrastructure to bring modern data services to existing applications. Only NetApp can help organizations free the resources necessary to fund transformation by deploying the industry’s leading ﬂash storage solution, which is highly efﬁcient and scalable in both data center and cloud environments. Job Summary Data has become the lifeblood of organizations, seamlessly ﬂowing through them in order to enable new customer touchpoints through technology, create innovative business opportunities and optimize operations. Organizations count on NetApp to manage and protect their data. Our customers count on NetApp cutting edge technologies such as software deﬁned infrastructure, cloud, hybrid cloud as well as traditional data center and the Data Fabric to connect and enable management seamlessly. \xa0And we never let them down. Continually breaking new ground is the norm here. We make sure of it with an open, collaborative culture that fuels fresh thinking. Right from day one, we’ll encourage you to share your views, challenge opinions and push boundaries. And thanks to mentoring and leadership programs that help you build on your personal and professional passions, you’ll develop your skills as fast as your ideas.\xa0Become a key part of our vision… As a Software Engineer at NetApp, you will work as part of a team responsible for the development, testing and sustaining of a key component of the NetApp data management portfolio. As part of the Research and Development function, focusing on enhancements to existing products as well as new product development. ', 'Responsibilities: ', 'Responsible for non-routine and unstructured tasks, requiring creative solutions with more interdependencies and with processes that are less deﬁned The individual works on complex problems with partially deﬁned, larger scope May work with teams across the company in problem solving and design efforts The individual will begin to develop a technical specialty ', 'Work effectively with staff to senior manager level employees within the function and the technical team on assigned projects. There may be communication with employees in other functions within Business Units as required Work independently Successfully convey information to stakeholders at many levels related to the position Participate as a proactive contributor and subject matter expert on team projects Demonstrate favorable results through coaching and inﬂuencing others ', 'Requirements: ', 'Education ']

['', "This opportunity has room to grow both personally and professionally, comes with autonomy and a complete lack of corporate nonsense. job_title: Software Engineer Instructor - Part-time - Remote - College & Grad Students
job_text: ['', 'How To Succeed.', 'Job details.', ' Clients - We have a huge network of students, parents, adults and private clients who are looking for help. We will connect you to them at no cost to you. In other words, 0% referral fee - no commissions, no monthly fees, no hidden fees. This is an industry first if you have ever worked on popular internet marketplaces. Community - Working in isolation is hard. The pandemic has challenged us to rethink how we must care for ourselves and others in a virtual world. We provide fun and welcoming environment so you can do your best, remote work. Take a peek at our company values.', 'About.', ' Clients - We have a huge network of students, parents, adults and private clients who are looking for help. We will connect you to them at no cost to you. In other words, 0% referral fee - no commissions, no monthly fees, no hidden fees. This is an industry first if you have ever worked on popular internet marketplaces.', 'Our community.', 'Hiring process.', 'What We Provide.', 'Take action.', ' Community - Working in isolation is hard. The pandemic has challenged us to rethink how we must care for ourselves and others in a virtual world. We provide fun and welcoming environment so you can do your best, remote work. Take a peek at our company values.', 'How To Fail.']

['Our stack is primarily based on Python and Java. We use Javascript, Bootstrap and AngularJS on the front-end and our databases comprise of Google BigQuery, MySQL, Redis, Google cloud data store. ', "Your work will impact millions of users and help create the world’s best SAAS payment system and fraud protection that will power some of the biggest and fastest growing online platforms in the world. We believe that businesses will increasingly accept payments through the software platforms they're already using to grow and manage their business. \xa0That's why we partner with companies like GoFundMe, Infusionsoft and FreshBooks to deliver integrated payment services to their users.", ' ', 'WePay’s API’s provides a flexible and robust payments system that seamlessly integrates into the software platforms of our customers while shielding them from fraud. You’ll be working with some of the best engineers in the world on a number of end-to-end projects like building our data infrastructure, API’s and microservices from scratch. ']

['', 'Experience with machine code (x86, x64, ARM).\xa0\xa0', 'Advanced software application development skills in Python and C++.', 'Preferred', 'Study and\xa0prototype\xa0new\xa0approaches drawn from academic literature, and evaluate their effectiveness for the product', 'MS or PhD in Computer Science.\xa0', 'Successful completion of a college-level machine-learning course.', 'Deep understanding of supervised machine learning techniques.\xa0', 'Qualifications', 'GrammaTech was founded in 1988, with the firmly‐grounded purpose of helping today’s organizations develop tomorrow’s software. With a focus on the evolving cyber‐security landscape, software hardening and intelligent systems, we tackle the most challenging software issues through a constant stream of highly innovative research and commercial development programs. Headquartered in Bethesda, MD, and a Research and Development Center in Ithaca, NY, as well as opportunities for remote employment.', 'Thorough understanding of data structures and algorithms.', 'Work\xa0closely with a team in\xa0an agile/scrum environment to deliver a high-quality SaaS product to customers', 'Exciting opportunity to work on significantly advancing the state-of-the-art in cybersecurity tools!\u202fThe successful candidate will work on\xa0CodeSentry\xa0- our new\xa0Software Composition Analysis and Cybersecurity product, focusing on using machine learning techniques to analyze software binaries. Training in using machine learning techniques for this purpose will be provided.\xa0', '\ufeffAbout the Company', 'Location: Preference is for Ithaca, NY or Bethesda, MD, but hiring manager may consider remote employees when there is a strong match of skills and experience.\xa0(COVID Restrictions are in place and the team will not require relocation until restrictions are lifted.)', 'Responsibilities', 'Preferred\xa0', 'Experience applying ML techniques in a production environment.\xa0', 'Members of underrepresented groups are encouraged to apply.', 'Help with the transition of the\xa0machine-learning components of our software analysis tool\xa0from research to product, and take\xa0ongoing\xa0ownership of the technology\xa0', 'Interest in learning about machine learning techniques and applying them to software analysis.', 'MS or PhD in Computer Science.\xa0Successful completion of a college-level machine-learning course.Deep understanding of supervised machine learning techniques.\xa0Experience applying ML techniques in a production environment.\xa0Experience with machine code (x86, x64, ARM).\xa0\xa0Knowledge of the cybersecurity domain.\xa0Knowledge of containerization, orchestration, and deployment (docker, Kubernetes, AWS).\xa0', 'We offer a competitive salary and benefits package including health care plan options, a generous paid time off program, flexible hours, 401(k) plan with company contribution, and opportunities for professional and personal development.\xa0', 'BS in Computer Science or equivalent.Four\xa0(4) years or more of industry experience.\xa0Interest in learning about machine learning techniques and applying them to software analysis.Advanced software application development skills in Python and C++.Thorough understanding of data structures and algorithms.Professional experience with Agile/Scrum and modern software engineering tools.', 'Innovation is at the heart of GrammaTech, and we are constantly pushing the boundaries of software research and development–from software assurance and software integrity to cyber‐security, threat mitigation and autonomic\xa0computing. We develop new technologies and see the results of our research incorporated into tools used by engineers and security professionals worldwide.', 'Professional experience with Agile/Scrum and modern software engineering tools.', 'Required\xa0', 'Four\xa0(4) years or more of industry experience.\xa0', '\xa0', 'Help with the transition of the\xa0machine-learning components of our software analysis tool\xa0from research to product, and take\xa0ongoing\xa0ownership of the technology\xa0Work\xa0closely with a team in\xa0an agile/scrum environment to deliver a high-quality SaaS product to customersStudy and\xa0prototype\xa0new\xa0approaches drawn from academic literature, and evaluate their effectiveness for the product', 'BS in Computer Science or equivalent.', 'Knowledge of the cybersecurity domain.\xa0', 'Knowledge of containerization, orchestration, and deployment (docker, Kubernetes, AWS).\xa0', 'GrammaTech, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity/Disability/Veterans/Affirmative Action employer.\xa0', 'CodeSentry', 'Required']

['', 'In addition to a great working environment and a strong focus on work-life integration, SIF offers a competitive salary and an amazing comprehensive benefits package. ', ' ', 'Experience with source control tools such as Git, RTC and agile delivery tools, e.g., Jira. ', 'Responsibilities:', 'Contribute to continually improving the software delivery processes, tools and relationships with all stakeholders who interact with the organization. ', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science (or related STEM field), or an equivalent combination of education and relevant experience. ', 'The State Insurance Fund (SIF) is Idaho’s leading workers compensation insurance provider. Since our inception in 1917, SIF has been dedicated to Idaho businesses and their injured workers. Our employees are the face of SIF and crucial to providing exceptional customer service. The majority of our policyholders are small businesses that are the backbone of Idaho’s economy. We are proud to offer services to help protect their employees and support their financial strength. ', 'Provide both tactical and strategic direction related to API development, application/system architecture and third-party integrations. ', 'As a Senior Software Engineer, you’ll be a key member of a dynamic team of IT professionals responsible for providing full-stack development, consisting of analysis, design, implementation, testing and on-going support and enhancements to SIF’s software applications and systems.  As a Senior Software Engineer, you will provide mentoring/coaching to other members of the Software Delivery team, as well as participate in a consultative relationship with internal and external stakeholders in developing technical and business solutions. ', 'Experience with relational databases such as Oracle and MS SQL Server. ', 'SIF values diversity and we are an equal opportunity employer.  Please note that applicants need to have legal authority to work permanently in the U.S.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science (or related STEM field), or an equivalent combination of education and relevant experience. Minimum 15 years of recent experience in a software/web development environment. Applied experience in an agile delivery environment utilizing a combination of Scrum, Kanban, Lean Software Development, XP or other agile process frameworks. Experience with a modern Integrated Development Environment, e.g., Eclipse, IntelliJ, Visual Studio. Working knowledge of APIs and the importance of designing to interfaces. Ability to develop solutions using object-oriented languages such as Java, C# and Python. Experience with relational databases such as Oracle and MS SQL Server. Experience with source control tools such as Git, RTC and agile delivery tools, e.g., Jira. ', 'Minimum 15 years of recent experience in a software/web development environment. ', 'Participate in a self-organized, self-directed team environment by exercising a high degree of collaboration, teamwork and personal accountability. ', 'Contribute to the development and on-going evolution of software engineering best practices, including but not limited to tool selection, coding/application security standards, and continual improvement of software delivery practices (continuous delivery). ', 'Ability to develop solutions using object-oriented languages such as Java, C# and Python. ', 'Create source code and associated unit, component and integration tests that contribute to loosely coupled, highly cohesive software applications and systems. Participate in collaborative information/requirements gathering sessions with business stakeholders using behavioral-driven development, specification by example and documented requirements. Provide both tactical and strategic direction related to API development, application/system architecture and third-party integrations. Contribute to the development and on-going evolution of software engineering best practices, including but not limited to tool selection, coding/application security standards, and continual improvement of software delivery practices (continuous delivery). Utilize agile software engineering best practices, including refactoring, pair programming, Test-Drive Development (TDD) and the use of automated testing tools, e.g., xUnit testing frameworks, QF-Test, Selenium. job_text: ['', 'Identify, evaluate, and provide recommendations for candidate technical solutions for a broad range of combat system integration problems and opportunities', 'Represent the combat system in platform-level technical forums and information exchanges', 'Knowledge of basic architecture modeling tools and languages, especially Systems Modeling Language (SysML) or Unified Modeling Language (UML)', 'POSITION INFORMATION', 'ABET accredited engineering degree', 'Title:', 'Coordinate and liaise with technical representatives from combat system elements (e.g., radars, missiles, guns, etc.) as well as non-combat system elements (e.g., aviation, communications)', 'POSITION OVERVIEW', 'Experience working with Navy combat systems (preferably AEGIS-based) or individual combat systems element(s)Knowledge of basic architecture modeling tools and languages, especially Systems Modeling Language (SysML) or Unified Modeling Language (UML)Knowledge of Model Based Systems Engineering (MBSE) best practicesKnowledge of computing hardware/infrastructure, networks, cybersecurity, and virtualizationKnowledge of agile methodology', 'Salary Range:\xa0$72,030 - job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Site Reliability Engineer
job_text: ['', 'Quarterly Professional Development allowance\xa0', 'Iterable is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer that proudly pursues and hires a diverse workforce. Iterable does not make hiring or employment decisions on the basis of race, color, religion or religious belief, ethnic or national origin, nationality, sex, gender, gender-identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, military or veteran status, or any other basis protected by applicable local, state, or federal laws or prohibited by Company policy. Iterable also strives for a healthy and safe workplace and strictly prohibits harassment of any kind. Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance and other similar state laws and local ordinances, and its internal policy, Iterable will also consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.', 'One of our core values is growth mindset and Iterable is a company where everyone can grow. If this is a role that excites you, please apply as we value applicants for the skills they bring beyond a job description.', 'Developing process, procedure and reporting on systems and team health metrics', 'Complete laptop workstation', 'We serve large enterprise customers and keeping our platform highly reliable, running at high performance, and secure is extremely important. We are treating operations the way we think about building software, and forming an SRE team to support this transformation.\xa0', 'The Team', 'Pre-tax commuter benefits', 'Join our team as an Incident Commander (with on-call responsibility) and act to ensure the right people are in the right place at the right time', 'One of our goals as a company is to cultivate a uniquely fun and growth-oriented culture. Our team of talented Engineers and thinkers is small, lean, empathetic, and balanced. As a Site Reliability Engineer (SRE), you will provide the expertise on how to build, test, monitor, and deploy scalable applications. You will develop, define, and document what the standards are for production, operations, and our growing resilient infrastructure.', 'Supplemental Health Insurance', 'Recent experience with algorithms, complexity analysis, and software design', 'Experience scaling complex systems for operational resiliency', 'Design and develop improvements, focused on resilience, to our production systems to achieve and surpass SLOs', 'Serve as an important point of contact for our customers to ensure they understand our efforts on their behalf', 'Daily lunch allowance', 'Experience developing software focused on systems and operational automation in a large-scale distributed environmentExperience scaling complex systems for operational resiliencyRecent experience with algorithms, complexity analysis, and software designPassion for learning and always improving yourself and the team around youFamiliarity with cloud infrastructure on AWS or similar', 'Experience developing software focused on systems and operational automation in a large-scale distributed environment', 'Evolving systems towards improved reliability and scalability', 'Perks & Benefits:', 'Paid parental leavePension planSupplemental Health InsuranceFlexible PTO\xa0Daily lunch allowanceMonthly Employee Wellness allowance\xa0Quarterly Professional Development allowance\xa0Pre-tax commuter benefitsComplete laptop workstation', 'Monthly Employee Wellness allowance\xa0', 'Passion for learning and always improving yourself and the team around you', 'This is a software engineering role (60% of your time) where you will focus on automation and improving production and operations resilienceDesign and develop improvements, focused on resilience, to our production systems to achieve and surpass SLOsDesigning and implementing, & monitoring and logging systems at scaleEvolving systems towards improved reliability and scalabilityJoin our team as an Incident Commander (with on-call responsibility) and act to ensure the right people are in the right place at the right timeFacilitate\xa0blameless\xa0Incident Retrospectives to understand root causes, communicate learnings, determine remediation and make us better and closer as a team.Help improve our operational practices to minimize service disruptionsTrack and communicate operational metrics surrounding incidents and the health of our systems\xa0Serve as an important point of contact for our customers to ensure they understand our efforts on their behalfInstrumenting production systems, collecting metrics, and improving observabilityTroubleshooting application, network, and database performance issuesDeveloping process, procedure and reporting on systems and team health metrics', 'Flexible PTO\xa0', 'Paid parental leave', 'Pension plan', 'This is a software engineering role (60% of your time) where you will focus on automation and improving production and operations resilience', 'Designing and implementing, & monitoring and logging systems at scale', 'Instrumenting production systems, collecting metrics, and improving observability', 'Track and communicate operational metrics surrounding incidents and the health of our systems\xa0', 'The SRE team will be responsible for the availability, resilience and performance of our systems by helping evolve our systems towards these goals, building automation and tooling, and owning incident management.\xa0', "In this role you'll get to:", 'Facilitate\xa0blameless\xa0Incident Retrospectives to understand root causes, communicate learnings, determine remediation and make us better and closer as a team.', 'We are looking for people who have:', 'How you will make an impact:', 'Familiarity with cloud infrastructure on AWS or similar', "Iterable's momentum grows daily and there has never been a more exciting time to join the team! We've been recognized as one of the\xa0Best Places to Work - SF\xa0for the past\xa0three years and we have also made\xa0Best Places to Work - Denver\xa0for 2020. In addition, Wealthfront listed us on their\xa02020 Career Launching Companies List\xa0and we’ve earned ourselves a top 20 spot among the SaaS 100. We have a nationwide presence with offices in San Francisco, New York, and Denver, plus our first international office in London. Our\xa0values are Trust, Growth Mindset, Humility, and Balance, and you can learn more about how we live our values as we scale on\xa0Our Culture\xa0page or more about our history\xa0on our\xa0About Us\xa0page.", 'Troubleshooting application, network, and database performance issues', 'Help improve our operational practices to minimize service disruptions', "Iterable is the growth marketing platform that enables brands to create, execute, and optimize campaigns to power world-class customer engagement across email, push, SMS, in-app and more with unparalleled data flexibility. We are an integrated, cross-channel solution—Iterable is built for marketers, trusted by engineers, and designed with intelligence. We know this space well: our product team built the growth systems that powered Twitter’s early success. We've raised a $60M Series D from top-tier investors like Index Ventures and CRV, and hundreds of companies like Zillow, SeatGeek, and Box rely on us to captivate their many millions of users."]

['', '•\xa0Plus: Experience architecting software with React Native, Node.js, PostgreSQL, AWS', 'This is a highly visible, creative, and agile role within a rapidly growing pre-IPO company in a nascent and fast-growing space. The role is in our trendy TriBeCa HQ, includes platinum-level healthcare and benefits, and is an excellent wealth-building/equity opportunity for the right individual.', '•\xa0Required: A portfolio of projects in which you had key role; for each, please be prepared to describe your role in the project, the technologies involved, the resources dedicated, and one challenging technical problem encountered and how it was overcome', '•\xa0Working closely with a great, close-knit team', '•\xa0Participating in discussions & brainstorming sessions on architecture, design, and logic/algorithms', 'Title:', 'Responsibilities:', 'Benefits:', 'Who We Are:', 'Equal Employment Opportunity:', '•\xa0Plus: Experience working in healthcare or related industries', 'Location:', 'About the Role:', '•\xa0Required: Pride in shipping beautiful, clean, and easily-maintainable code', '•\xa0Required: Experience with cloud microservice architectures, configuration, operation, and maintenance', '•\xa0Working in a dynamic atmosphere of an evolving strategy and scope', 'Qualifications:', 'Title: Technical Lead', '•\xa0Required: 3+ years of experience in development on a variety of languages, platforms, frameworks, and technologies', 'We are looking for an experienced software engineer with exceptional ability to architect systems at every level, from application code to shared libraries, to cloud infrastructure. Currently, our focus is on expanding our platform for providing a unified experience for our existing therapeutic applications as well as the new and strategic applications for which we are engineering and clinical validating. We have an expanding list of public, private, and privileged web properties and our software meets our patients on our mobile applications (iOS, Android) which are supported by APIs hosted within our secure virtual private cloud. We are investing in our quickly-expanding data science and analytics, prediction, and personalization services, and strive to greatly advance real-time machine learning to provide a personal user experience to each patient.', ':', '•\xa0Required: Able to express intelligence and creativity by using programming to solve complex real-world problems', 'Although every member of our development team spends most of the time writing code, we are really looking for an engineer who shares our focus on and care for the success of our product and business, as well as driving life-altering outcomes for our patients. We love to work with engineers who are just as comfortable talking about low-level memory allocation, distributed systems architecture, or how to give aspects of an application a more engaging user experience. Our developers are equal parts user-advocate, architect, problem solver, and coder.\xa0', 'Stock options | Competitive salary with annual review | 401(k) matching | Annual performance-based cash bonus | Comprehensive medical benefits through Aetna | Flexible Spending Accounts | Life insurance and disability benefits | Open vacation policy / unlimited PTO | Generous paid parental leave | Commuter subsidies | Monthly catered lunches | Choice of Apple or PC equipment | Sponsored company events | Free, unlimited office snacks and beverages | Much more…', '•\xa0Required: A self-starter who requires little day-to-day supervision/direction and is comfortable providing mentorship to other engineers', '•\xa0Required: Mastery of design patterns and collaborative software development best practices', 'Location: TriBeCa, New York City, United States', 'Click Therapeutics is committed to equal opportunity in the terms and conditions of employment for all employees and job applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, age, gender identity or gender expression, national origin, disability or veteran status. Click Therapeutics also complies with all applicable national, state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment as well as employment eligibility verification requirements of the Immigration and Nationality Act. All applicants must have authorization to work for Click Therapeutics in the U.S. In certain circumstances it may be advantageous to Click Therapeutics to support the application(s) for temporary visa classification and/or sponsor applications for permanent residence so that a foreign national colleague can accept or remain in a work assignment in the U. S. For certain classes of temporary visas, the resulting work authorization may be specific to Click Therapeutics and the specific job and/or work site. Click Therapeutics may at its business discretion decide to or refrain from obtaining, maintaining and/or extending the temporary visa status and/or sponsoring a colleague for permanent residency and /or employment eligibility, considering factors such as availability of qualified U.S. workers and the colleague\'s long-term prospects for securing lawful permanent residence, among other reasons. Employment applicants requiring immigration sponsorship must disclose, when initial application for employment is made, whether or not they are legally authorized to work for Click Therapeutics in the U.S. and, if so, whether that authorization permits them to work in the job they seek. In no case should Click Therapeutics support of a colleague\'s temporary visa application or sponsorship of a colleague for permanent residence be construed to guarantee success of that application or amend or otherwise invalidate the "at-will" employment relationship between the colleague and Click Therapeutics.', '•\xa0Lots of coding! And problem solving. And more coding!', 'Click Therapeutics, Inc. develops and commercializes software as prescription medical treatments for people with unmet medical needs. Through cognitive and neurobehavioral mechanisms, Click’s Digital Therapeutics™ enable change within individuals, and are designed to be used independently or in conjunction with biomedical treatments. The Clickometrics® adaptive data science platform continuously personalizes user experience to optimize engagement and outcomes. Following a groundbreaking clinical trial, Click’s industry-leading smoking cessation program is available nationwide through a wide variety of payers, providers, and employers. Click’s lead prescription program is entering into a multi-center, randomized, controlled, parallel-group, phase III FDA registration trial for the treatment of Major Depressive Disorder in adults. Major pipeline expansion and progression is expected.', '•\xa0Strongly preferred: Experience developing within an agile scrum planning methodology']

['', ' Competitive compensation packages with a salary, bonuses, and restricted stock grants ', " You'll get far more responsibility than at a big company, while feeling far less stress than in a 2-person garage start-up ", ' Redfin is an equal opportunity employer committed to hiring a diverse workforce.', ' At Redfin, you’ll have the support and resources to continue learning, a brilliant team with which to collaborate and a commitment to your career so you can grow with the company under a management team that has experience building start-ups into profitable, publicly traded companies ', ' More than anything, you share a passion for our mission to radically change the way people make one of the biggest decisions of their lives. ', ' Generous benefits, including paid vacation, medical, dental, and vision insurance, and fully paid family leave ', ' Strong startup culture with a casual dress code, happy hours, and more ', ' You love writing robust code that grows with the business that is both maintainable and well tested. ', ' You operate well in the unknown, advocate for your team, aren’t afraid to take risks and learn from your mistakes. ', " You are a senior developer with 5+ years of industry experience designing, architecting and developing full-stack applications.  You have a proven track record of owning and driving complex multi-person technical projects from design to implementation to production.  You love writing robust code that grows with the business that is both maintainable and well tested.  You know when to use proven, pre-built and community supported technologies, and when it's time to build a tailored solution from the ground up.  You hold your peers accountable for their best possible effort by providing insightful and actionable feedback. You always look for ways to make the team more efficient.  You are a teacher and a mentor: you have the leadership skills, empathy, and the patience to improve the developers around you.  You drive consensus on team discussions. When you disagree, you disagree constructively, with respect for everyone else's opinions and ideas.  More than anything, you share a passion for our mission to radically change the way people make one of the biggest decisions of their lives. ", ' You are a senior developer with 5+ years of industry experience designing, architecting and developing full-stack applications. ['', 'About Boku:', 'Work hands-on with a highly skilled team of engineers', 'Build a layered, component-based, service-oriented architecture', 'Experience working with mobile carriers or mobile SMS systems', 'Responsibilities:', 'Requirements:', 'Familiarity and experience with a wide range of programming languages and technologiesExperience integrating with third-party web services across a variety of technologies, e.g. REST, SOAP, SMPPExperience with some (or all) of the following technologies/frameworks/tools: Maven, Git, MySQL, JMS, Spring, JPA/Hibernate, Jersey, JMX, Jetty, Hessian.Experience working with mobile carriers or mobile SMS systemsExperience with authentication methods, sign up and login flowsDevelopment and design experience with messaging systems e.g. ActiveMQ, WebSphere-MQExperience using agile methodologies and tools', 'Experience with some (or all) of the following technologies/frameworks/tools: Maven, Git, MySQL, JMS, Spring, JPA/Hibernate, Jersey, JMX, Jetty, Hessian.', 'We’re a small company, but we have a global reach. We work face-to-face with colleagues and collaborate across disciplines. But our clients, partners, and operations are all over the world. Boku is a busy, exciting, and demanding place to work, but it’s the people that make the company. The mix of cultures, viewpoints, and experience is vital for a global company like ours and every person’s contribution is valued. If you are looking for a new challenge in an exciting, innovative and international working environment, we are the ideal company for you.', 'Meet eligibility requirements to work in the US', 'Fluent in Java and have experience with building service-oriented, database driven applications', 'Demonstrated great communication and influential skill', 'Experience with authentication methods, sign up and login flows', 'Incorporated in 2008, Boku is one of the world’s leading providers of carrier billing and mobile identity solutions. Using nothing more than a user’s mobile phone, Boku’s technology can verify a user’s identity, execute a payment, or provision a new service, radically simplifying common, everyday mobile interactions between consumers and businesses. This is possible because Boku’s platform can access the internal billing, identity, and sales systems of mobile operators globally. Businesses who utilize Boku’s platform include major brands such as Apple, Google, Microsoft, Sony, Facebook, Spotify, Netflix, Paypal, Experian, Fiserv, Western Union, Uber, and Discover. Boku was originally financed through top-tier investors including Andreessen Horowitz, Benchmark, DAG Ventures, Index Ventures, Khosla Ventures, and NEA. ', 'Demonstrated ability to complete projects that required significant problem solving, communication skills, and the ability to collaborate with multiple teams in a fast-paced environment', '\xa0\xa0', 'Proficiency with development tools such as debuggers and memory profilers', 'Bill.Stevens@PRITechnology.com', 'This position is fully remote. The firms teams leverage Semantic Web concepts and open standards such as RDF/CSVW that allows their clients to understand how their data is connected. They expose Self-Service controls using Flask web server and React-based Web Apps.', 'www.PriTechnology.com', 'Ability to learn new skills and technologies and adapt quickly', 'LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/pub/bill-stevens/3/26/687/', 'PRI Technology', "The world's largest financial institutions require vast amounts of data to help their clients manage their portfolios, execute their trades and analyze the markets. This major firm provides these institutions a platform to make hundreds of thousands of requests for data spanning the full range of the financial industry each day. Supporting this translates to billions of data points that flow through our system daily, including Equities, Commodities, Bonds, Pricing, Corporate Actions, Regulatory and Reference Data. To meet the demand, the Data License department is responsible for gathering, transforming, and delivering all the data our clients request through a distributed workflow platform, microservices, and web integrations.", '\xa0', 'Make contributions to Open Source projects', 'The interview process will include an initial telephone screening. ways to help ourselves and our teams to minimize pain points within our infrastructure and code base.\xa0', 'We don’t expect to be perfect, but we are always proactively seeking out ways to help ourselves and our teams to minimize pain points within our infrastructure and code base.\xa0We love technology -- and follow the latest technologies, sharing what we learn.We are not afraid of failing when we are experimenting with different technologies, development methodologies, and toolings.We build strong relationships with team members around the globe.', 'We are not afraid of failing when we distributed teams.', '-\xa0You will help to protect and secure Medallia systems and customer’s data\xa0', 'Design, build, and maintain security related features and solutions for Medallia’s core years\xa0of demonstrated experience with Java or C++ or similar object-oriented\xa0languages.', 'Medallia is the global leader in Customer Experience Management. Our mission is to create a world where companies are loved by their customers; where organizations see you as a person and not just their next sale. We do this by building a bridge between hundreds of companies and billions of customers, around the world, enabling access to your eyes, ears, and hearts, so they may design and deliver extraordinary experiences, every single day.', 'Must be a U.S citizen and meet background check requirements of U.S Federal Government.', 'Medallia’s mission is to help companies win through customer experience. The world’s best-loved brands trust Medallia’s Experience Cloud™, which embeds the pulse of the customer in an organization and empowers employees with the real-time customer data, insights, and tools they need to make every experience great. Named a leader in the most recent Forrester Wave and ranked in the 2018 Forbes Cloud 100 list, Medallia is growing quickly, with a global footprint that spans Silicon Valley, Austin, New York, Washington DC, London, Paris, Sydney, Buenos Aires, Tel Aviv, and Prague. Here, we value people for each of the aspects that make them whole. We believe that people should not be defined only by a job title—nobody is "just an engineer" or "just a salesperson." We are each partners, parents, children, siblings, friends, and former classmates. We have different backgrounds and we celebrate different cultures. And, just like our product, we honor each of the experiences that build our people.', 'We love technology -- and follow the latest technologies, sharing what we learn.', 'We build strong relationships with team members around the globe.', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent degree.3+ years\xa0of demonstrated experience with Java or C++ or similar object-oriented\xa0languages.Experience building distributed systems/enterprise systems on a modern stack.Demonstrate strong software engineering fundamentals and agile process experience with\xa0an ability to work in fast-paced and distributed teams.Must be a U.S citizen and meet background check requirements of U.S Federal Government.']

job_title: System Engineer - Print Check & Metrology Function
job_text: ['', 'Experience', 'Context of the position', 'Job Mission', 'Hands-on Experience On Semiconductor Process Or Equipment Is Required', 'Personal skills', '730, et seq.). Qualified candidates must be legally authorized to access such controlled technology prior to beginning work. Business demands may require ASML to proceed with applicants who are immediately eligible to access controlled technology.”Job Mission The System Engineer Wafer Print Check & Metrology Function is expected to define the technical content supporting the Wafer Print Check product, as well as the Functional roadmap for E-Beam metrology, such that the defined products support the success of HMI in the competitive E-Beam metrology & inspection markets.Job DescriptionCreates content proposal based on Product Marketing product definition for the Wafer Print Check product.Defines and aligns the x-domain/sector/product functional requirements, design and test specifications for Wafer Print CheckOversee system design with focus on system layout, fab and E-beam system interfacing, modularity and extendibilityDefines and aligns internal and external requirements for product deployment and remote analytics development capability.Aligns and incorporates x-product team functionality in the platform definition and rollout plans to ensure ASML has a cohesive technical strategy for the Metrology function, extending both to CD and OverlayOwns the technology roadmap for Metrology, in collaboration with the responsible Functional Architects relevant to the technology.Signals architecture misalignment and organizes/prepares (4 o’clock) meetings to set direction.Deliverables: Feasibility Test Definitions, Product Feasibility Reports, product performance specifications and design specifications, system level alpha test definition and acceptance reports, technology roadmap.Prepares technical input to key program decisions for review by senior executives. Manage system engineering deliverables to the product generation process such as identification of key technical risks, system performance projections and status of the overall architecture development.Responsible for optimal functional integration of subsystems into the whole product (guiding the product integration plan).EducationAcademic level (Master or PhD) in Information technology, Software, Physics, Mathematics or any Technical areaExperienceMinimum 8 years of experience in related fields is a plus for candidates, including IC manufacturing, semiconductor process technology, e-beam inspection/metrology, or equivalent experience.Hands-on Experience On Semiconductor Process Or Equipment Is RequiredFast learner with strong self-motivation to grow technically; be able to perform job at high standard with minimum supervision, and demonstrated ability to thrive in a high pressure and fast paced environment.Personal skillsCommunication skills: Able to communicate with counterparts efficiently on project work.Team work: Good team player to drive product development with stakeholders.Context of the positionPHYSICAL DEMANDS AND WORK ENVIRONMENTThe physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.While performing the duties of this job, the employee routinely is required to sit; walk; talk; hear; use hands to keyboard, finger, handle, and feel; stoop, kneel, crouch, twist, reach, and stretch.The employee is occasionally required to move around the campus.The employee may occasionally lift and/or move up to 50 pounds.May require travel dependent on business needs.Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision, color vision, peripheral vision, depth perception, and ability to adjust focus.Can work under deadlines.The environment generally is moderate in temperature and noise level.Must be able to read and interpret data, information, and documents.Can observe and respond to people and situations and interact with others encountered in the course of work.Can learn and apply new information or skills.Responsibilities include periodic travel to regional and overseas sites for product technical support and special support projects.Work may include onsite technical support involving heavy lifting of equipment & modules.Position will require technical work activity in a clean-room production environment and/or laboratory setting.The environment generally is moderate in temperature and noise level.Occasionally may be exposed to loud noise bursts and may be exposed to toxic gases (fluorine).Must be able to work in small, confined spaces.We offer competitive salaries and benefits including medical, dental, vision, 401(K), and FSAs.Other informationEOE AA M/F/Veteran/Disability', 'Introduction', 'Other information', 'Job Description', 'Education']

['', '5+ years of internet/web development experience working on a Cloud-based SaaS product designing service oriented architecture with scalability, resiliency\xa0Excellent communication skillsExperiences with design and deployment of scalable applications in a public cloud. Preferably AWSFamiliarity and experience with modern cloud technologies, such as containers (docker preferred) and serverless architectureBachelor of Science degree in Computer Science, ideally including coursework in algorithms, data structures, software design, operating systems (Think: Strong CS fundamentals)Bonus points for:\xa0Experience with healthcare technologies, Nodejs and Javascript/Typescript, frontend development experiences with ReactJS', 'Work on a cross-functional team that reaches across our entire product and relentlessly drive process improvements across the organization', 'Bonus points for:\xa0Experience with healthcare technologies, Nodejs and Javascript/Typescript, frontend development experiences with ReactJS', 'Mentoring other engineers and helping to build a learning environment for the team.', 'Xealth is seeking a Sr. Software Engineer with the following background:', 'We offer a unique opportunity to create a meaningful product in a focused engineering environment where you can continue to develop your engineering skills as you work with a variety of modern cloud-based technologies.', 'Learn more about us at www.xealth.com', '\xa0\xa0', 'Familiarity and experience with modern cloud technologies, such as containers (docker preferred) and serverless architecture', 'Excellent communication skills', 'About Xealth', 'Bonus points for:\xa0', 'Write reusable, testable code', 'Xealth is a digital-health clearinghouse in the cloud, enabling clinicians to easily prescribe digital health tools for their patients, monitor their progress, drive usage, and ultimately attain improved health (with significantly lower long-term health costs).', 'Responsibilities', 'Prioritize multiple tasks intelligently, speak up when you see issues', 'Xealth created the cloud-based clearing-house for digital health content. On the road ahead, we will create responsive web applications, develop custom recommendation engines, and create analytics solutions to help clinicians throughout the US. Our product runs on AWS, integrating tightly with 3rd party EMR and practice management systems such as Cerner and Epic. We’re a highly skilled, passionate team, disciplined in our agile approach, with a track record of success –– and we are proud to be applying our efforts to improve healthcare options for everyone.', 'Xealth is committed to providing reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities and disabled veterans in our job application procedures.', "Make a positive difference in other people's lives through your work - we’re revolutionizing healthcare for allMake a big contribution across the entire product stack in a small, passionate team", 'Xealth spun out of Providence St. Joseph Health (PSJH) in 2017. Investors include Atrium Health, Cerner, Cleveland Clinic, MemorialCare Innovation Fund, McKesson Ventures, Novartis, Philips, ResMed, Providence Ventures, UPMC and the Froedtert and Medical College of Wisconsin Health Network. Key clients include Baylor Scott & White Health, Duke Health, Advocate Aurora and Mass General Brigham.', '5+ years of internet/web development experience working on a Cloud-based SaaS product designing service oriented architecture with scalability, resiliency\xa0', "Architect, design and develop scalable enterprise SaaS applications in the public cloud.Write reusable, testable codeDesign and develop Web Services, APIs, and integration to 3rd party EMR systems like Epic and CernerMentoring other engineers and helping to build a learning environment for the team.Work on a cross-functional team that reaches across our entire product and relentlessly drive process improvements across the organizationPrioritize multiple tasks intelligently, speak up when you see issuesMake a real, positive difference in other people's lives through your work", 'Experiences with design and deployment of scalable applications in a public cloud. Preferably AWS', 'Architect, design and develop scalable enterprise SaaS applications in the public cloud.', 'Make a big contribution across the entire product stack in a small, passionate team', 'Compensation & Benefits', "Make a positive difference in other people's lives through your work - we’re revolutionizing healthcare for all", 'Design and develop Web Services, APIs, and integration to 3rd party EMR systems like Epic and Cerner', 'About Xealth:', "Make a real, positive difference in other people's lives through your work", 'Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science, ideally including coursework in algorithms, data structures, software design, operating systems (Think: Strong CS fundamentals)', 'Xealth has been named to the CB Insights Digital Health 150, awarded the “Best Connected Health Platform” by the MedTech Breakthrough Awards, and was named to Fast Company’s Annual List of the World’s Most Innovative Companies in 2020.', 'Competencies', 'Xealth offers a multi-tiered approach when constructing a highly competitive compensation package. The compensation package would include a base salary, equity, and a comprehensive suite of benefits.']

['', 'What makes this job interesting?', 'We’re looking for someone who:', 'Is driven to unlock the potential of data to positively impact the real world', 'Gets excited when working as part of a motivated, collaborative team', 'Ownership - The CSL team is retooling.\xa0An ideal candidate is an engineer looking to grow their responsibilities and work with the team to have a significant technical and business impact.', 'Rapidly growing global data intelligence firm seeks Full Stack Software Engineer.  As they pursue their mission of providing businesses with unique insights on small business data, your work will be integral to the user journey, touching all points of the customer journey.\xa0', 'The opportunity:', 'Has experience with building modern web applications and is familiar with React (Next.JS experience is a plus)', 'Prides themselves on writing highly readable, thoroughly tested code (we use React and Python)', 'Has experience with building modern web applications and is familiar with React (Next.JS experience is a plus)Engages with designers and product managers to bring to life outstanding user experiencesPrides themselves on writing highly readable, thoroughly tested code (we use React and Python)Gets excited when working as part of a motivated, collaborative teamIdentifies problems that others aren’t seeing and makes sure they get solvedIs driven to unlock the potential of data to positively impact the real world', 'Technical Challenge - You will be building the UX for sophisticated data users as well as scaling high-throughput, high-availability ML-driven systems on cloud infrastructure.\xa0These systems drive critical decision making at multi-billion dollar companies.', 'Engages with designers and product managers to bring to life outstanding user experiences', 'Apply now to learn more!', 'As a core member of the team you will share technical ownership of our user experience with a team of motivated, product-minded individuals.\xa0', 'You’ll work with curious, driven teammates to build modern web applications that\xa0amplify the power of our data product. You will collaborate with designers, product managers, and engineers–all of whom are eager to embrace change to improve. You will have a platform to influence our entire product landscape.', 'Identifies problems that others aren’t seeing and makes sure they get solved', 'The role:', 'Technical Challenge - You will be building the UX for sophisticated data users as well as scaling high-throughput, high-availability ML-driven systems on cloud infrastructure.\xa0These systems drive critical decision making at multi-billion dollar companies.Ownership - The CSL team is retooling.\xa0An ideal candidate is an engineer looking to grow their responsibilities and work with the team to have a significant technical and business impact.']

['', 'What you’ll do:', 'Contribute to technical documentation and training materials to support users and other developers with diverse expertise.', 'You’re familiar with at least one industry-standard programming language for developing front end applications (e.g., Java, PHP, Python, JavaScript/TypeScript).', 'About Sage Bionetworks', 'As a member of our team, you will work closely with scientists and other bioinformatics engineers in the Computational Oncology group to support research projects in cancer and healthcare. Our work includes the harmonization, analysis, and sharing of biomedical data (e.g. genomic, clinical, and imaging data) across various biomedical research institutions) — and helping scientists around the world work together to accelerate discovery. Ideal candidates will be enthusiastic about the application of data science and technology to enable open, collaborative, and reproducible biomedical research.', 'You enjoy supporting diverse teams — including computational biologists, research ethicists, software engineers, and data librarians — to solve complex scientific problems.', 'At Sage Bionetworks, we believe that we can learn more by learning from each other. By improving the way scientists collaborate, we help to make science more effective. We partner with researchers, patients, and healthcare innovators to drive collaborative data-driven science to improve health. Making science more open, collaborative, and inclusive ultimately advances biomedicine.\xa0', 'Sage Bionetworks is a nonprofit biomedical research and technology development organization that was founded in Seattle in 2009. Our focus is to develop and apply open practices to data-driven research for the advancement of human health. Data-driven research has become an important component of biomedicine, but it’s not always easy to understand how to apply computational approaches appropriately or how to interpret their results. Sage believes open practices can help. Our interdisciplinary team of scientists and engineers work together to provide researchers access to technology tools and scientific approaches to share data, benchmark methods, and explore collective insights, all backed by Sage’s gold-standard governance protocols and commitment to user-centered design. Sage is supported through a portfolio of competitive research grants, commercial partnerships, and philanthropic contributions.', 'You have a MS in Computer Science, Bioinformatics, Computer Engineering or a related field, or a BS with 2+ years of relevant job experience.', 'We’d love to hear from you if:\xa0', 'Develop tools and applications to facilitate tracking, scalability, and reproducibility of data and computational analyses in large scale scientific collaborationsAssist with the creation of dashboards, visualizations, and other resources for experimental and clinical biologists to explore and leverage data and analysis results.Contribute to technical documentation and training materials to support users and other developers with diverse expertise.Work with Sage engineers to drive general improvements in data and analysis management platforms, transfer knowledge and code into production systems, or deploy standalone services and applications.Regularly participate in and monitor the development of external groups and communities to stay informed on best practices and standards.', 'You have experience developing interactive apps and visualizations in R with Shiny, htmlwidgets, and related libraries.You’re familiar with at least one industry-standard programming language for developing front end applications (e.g., Java, PHP, Python, JavaScript/TypeScript).You are comfortable working in a cloud based IT environment.You’re proficient in container technologies such as Docker.\xa0You have experience working with biomedical (including genomic or clinical) data.', 'You are comfortable working in a cloud based IT environment.', 'You have effective verbal, written, and organizational skills with the ability to communicate with a variety of technical and non-technical collaborators.', 'Work with Sage engineers to drive general improvements in data and analysis management platforms, transfer knowledge and code into production systems, or deploy standalone services and applications.', 'Regularly participate in and monitor the development of external groups and communities to stay informed on best practices and standards.', 'You’re proficient in container technologies such as Docker.\xa0', '(also preferred, but not required)', 'In light of recent concerns of Covid-19, all interviews will be conducted remotely, and most positions will be remote through at least June 30, 2021. The option to work on-site at our Seattle office prior to June 30, will be considered upon request.', 'Do you have expertise in tool building and a passion for mission-driven work? Do you want to be an important contributor to a team that includes computational biologists, software engineers, and data curators? If so, could be our next Bioinformatics Engineer.\xa0', 'You’re proficient in scripting and experienced with package development in R or Python.', 'You have experience working with biomedical (including genomic or clinical) data.', 'You’re passionate about open science and collaboration.You have a MS in Computer Science, Bioinformatics, Computer Engineering or a related field, or a BS with 2+ years of relevant job experience.You’re proficient in scripting and experienced with package development in R or Python.You have experience with collaborative development and version control systems (e.g. git).You are comfortable working in Linux and automating tasks via shell scripting or other techniques.You enjoy supporting diverse teams — including computational biologists, research ethicists, software engineers, and data librarians — to solve complex scientific problems.You have effective verbal, written, and organizational skills with the ability to communicate with a variety of technical and non-technical collaborators.', 'Develop tools and applications to facilitate tracking, scalability, and reproducibility of data and computational analyses in large scale scientific collaborations', 'You’re passionate about open science and collaboration.', 'You are comfortable working in Linux and automating tasks via shell scripting or other techniques.', '\xa0', 'Sage embraces diversity and equity. We offer a comprehensive benefits package, including relocation benefits, to bring the right talent to the team. We are based in Seattle, WA, and collaborate broadly throughout the world.', 'You have experience developing interactive apps and visualizations in R with Shiny, htmlwidgets, and related libraries.', 'Assist with the creation of dashboards, visualizations, and other resources for experimental and clinical biologists to explore and leverage data and analysis results.', 'You have experience with collaborative development and version control systems (e.g. git).']

['\xa0Okta is the foundation for secure connections between people and technology. By harnessing the power of the cloud, Okta allows people to access applications on any device at any time, while still enforcing strong security policies. It integrates directly with an organization’s existing\xa0directories\xa0and identity systems, as well as 6,500+ applications.\xa0', '', '· Experience with server-side technologies including caching, asynchronous processing, and multi-threading', '· Experience developing full stack web applications', '· Design and implement core, high-performance, scalable software components', '· 7+ years of full stack software development experience building highly-reliable, mission-critical software', 'Okta is rethinking the traditional work environment, providing our employees with the flexibility to be their most creative and successful versions of themselves, no matter where they are located. We enable a flexible approach to work, meaning for roles where it makes sense, you can work from the office, or from home, regardless of where you live. Okta invests in the best technologies and provides flexible benefits and collaborative work environments/experiences, empowering employees to work productively in a setting that best and uniquely suits their needs.', '· Analyze/Refine Requirements with Product Management', '· Experience with Directory services (eg: LDAP and Active Directory)', '· Excellent grasp of software engineering principles', 'Job Duties and Responsibilities:', 'You will share our passion and great pride in elegant solutions and will join an engineering team that strongly believes in designing for scale, rigorous code reviews, automated testing, and an iterative process to build high-quality next generation enterprise software. You will get an opportunity to solve hard problems around hybrid enterprise use cases and scaling the most widely used and deployed on-premises directories.', 'Because Okta runs on an integrated platform, organizations can implement the service quickly at large scale and low total cost. Over 9,400 organizations, including Engie, JetBlue, Nordstrom, Takeda Pharmaceutical,\xa0Teach for America, T-Mobile and Twilio, trust Okta to help protect the identities of their workforces and customers.', 'The vision is to make Okta the Directory of record and help customer’s with their journey to the Cloud, continue to automate the journey, and lower the barrier of entry to their migration journey. We are looking for an experienced full stack engineer to work on our directories integration capabilities. ', '· Interface with QA, Product Management, Technical Support, Documentation and UX teams', 'Our elite team is fast, innovative and flexible; with a weekly, agile release cycle and individual ownership. We expect great things from our engineers and reward them with stimulating new projects, emerging technologies and the chance to have significant impact in a company that is changing the cloud computing landscape forever.', 'This is an opportunity to leverage your experience developing highly scalable cloud applications while building new skills in Identity and cloud platform development or to leverage your experience developing Identity products while building new skills in cloud applications and platform development.', '· Test-driven development, design and code reviews', '· Experience with Java, C#, or C++', 'The team is responsible for designing and building how Okta streamlines authentication and synchronization with on-premises 3rd-party directories (e.g. LDAP and Active Directory) and help aid customers to migrate to a centralized view and control plane for identity and access leveraging Okta’s Universal Directory. Okta’s Universal Directory aims to build a system which brings together user information that’s scattered across the cloud to one single location and use it as source to provision/update accounts in various third party systems. The quality of these integrations is a strategic differentiator and enable our customers to gain competitive advantages over their competitors.', '· Work with\u202fengineering\u202fmanagement to scope and plan\u202fengineering\u202fefforts', '· Experience working with a system of scale', '\xa0', 'Required Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities:', 'Okta is an equal opportunity employer', 'Position Description:']

We also believe in full ownership and expect teams to own all parts of the software, from architecture and testing to production monitoring and performance optimizations.\xa0', '\xa0', 'You will be working on projects that will define the future of financial planning at Northwestern Mutual.\xa0 Your technical expertise/background is broad, using cutting-edge technologies such as\xa0GraphQL, React, JavaScript, Node.js, Docker, and Kubernetes, to help solve challenges that will have a direct impact on the digital transformation and user experience of our clients and customers.
