job_title: Senior Software Engineer, AI Infrastructure - Deep Learning
job_text: ['', 'Contributions to open-source DNN frameworks.', "Be responsible for developing Deep Learning software infrastructure for large scale image and video processing tasks and leading major technical projects for the team. The range of applications you'll work on includes: automotive driver assistance, autonomous navigation and robotics.Be a part of a dynamic product and customer oriented team, thus excellent communication skills are required. Your expertise, creativity and leadership will help bring the future of self-driving cars to our doorsteps.", 'A dedication to bring your work to fruition and see it ship in cars worldwide.', 'Experience with any of the deep learning frameworks: Tensorflow, PyTorch, Caffé, Keras, ...', 'Be a part of a dynamic product and customer oriented team, thus excellent communication skills are required. Your expertise, creativity and leadership will help bring the future of self-driving cars to our doorsteps.', '10+ years of relevant work experience, including technical leadership experience.', "What You'll Be Doing", 'Self-motivation, outstanding collaboration with peers and users, customer-oriented mindset.', 'Experience with CUDA.', 'Track record of successful technical leadership on major, impactful deep learning projects.', 'Excellent communication and organization skills.', ' You have a BS or MS in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or equivalent work experience. ', 'Expertise in developing production level deep learning infrastructure and/or a deep understanding of the underlying concepts.', 'Track record of elevating teams and increasing their velocity by helping others.', 'Experience working with multi-node/distributed training, data loading and image/video processing.', 'Previous experience of scaling up and optimizing HPC, computer vision or deep learning training pipelines to terabyte scale datasets is a huge plus.Experience with CUDA.Contributions to open-source DNN frameworks.Prior experience using machine learning / neural networks to solve problems in image or video analysis.', 'What We Need To See', 'Excellent C/C++ and Python programming with top software design skills.', "Be responsible for developing Deep Learning software infrastructure for large scale image and video processing tasks and leading major technical projects for the team. The range of applications you'll work on includes: automotive driver assistance, autonomous navigation and robotics.", 'Previous experience of scaling up and optimizing HPC, computer vision or deep learning training pipelines to terabyte scale datasets is a huge plus.', '10+ years of relevant work experience, including technical leadership experience. You have a BS or MS in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or equivalent work experience. Track record of successful technical leadership on major, impactful deep learning projects.Track record of elevating teams and increasing their velocity by helping others.Experience mentoring junior developers.Expertise in developing production level deep learning infrastructure and/or a deep understanding of the underlying concepts.Good understanding of highly parallel compute, storage and software architectures.Excellent C/C++ and Python programming with top software design skills.Experience with any of the deep learning frameworks: Tensorflow, PyTorch, Caffé, Keras, ...Experience working with multi-node/distributed training, data loading and image/video processing.A dedication to bring your work to fruition and see it ship in cars worldwide.Excellent communication and organization skills.Self-motivation, outstanding collaboration with peers and users, customer-oriented mindset.', 'Prior experience using machine learning / neural networks to solve problems in image or video analysis.', 'Experience mentoring junior developers.', 'Good understanding of highly parallel compute, storage and software architectures.', 'Ways To Stand Out Of The Crowd']

['', 'Primary Responsibilities:', 'CI/CD principles and automation tools (Jenkins, etc.)', 'Civitas Learning is bringing together the best of new technology, design thinking, and data science in our mission to help one million more students graduate each year. We are building a data platform and cloud-based applications to deliver insights and action analytics to the frontlines of education. We are looking for insanely talented people who want to jump in and roll up their sleeves with us to make it all happen, and do the best work of their careers.', 'Deploying, maintaining, and leveraging application monitoring, alerting, and logging tools (New Relic, Prometheus, Grafana, OpsGenie, Splunk)', 'Minimum Qualifications:', 'Experience with some of the following is a huge bonus:', 'Manage all aspects of AWS infrastructure (networking, access controls, cost, auditing, etc.)\xa0 and maintain our “infrastructure as code” repository in Terraform.', 'Work with various dev and non-dev teams to architect, test, and deploy solutions with a wide range of technologies.\xa0', 'Cloud Engineer', '4+ years with a cloud provider and technologies such as AWS, Azure, GCP', 'About Civitas Learning:', 'Kubernetes in a production environment', 'Secure development practices', 'Containers and related technologies (Docker, Kubernetes, AWS ECS, etc.)', 'Helm', 'Git (or other modern source control)', 'Linux command line tools and troubleshooting methods', 'Runtime Configuration Management (e.g. 12 Factor Apps)', 'Today, Civitas Learning has more than 375 colleges and universities as customers, serving nearly 8 million students. Together with our growing community of customers, Civitas Learning is making the most of the world’s learning data to graduate a million more students per year by 2025.', 'Civitas offers a comprehensive benefits package including a company-wide bonus program, medical, dental, vision, disability insurance, onsite paid parking, 401-K Program\xa0 and a flexible paid time off policy. Civitas Learning is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability.', '4+ years experience with languages such as shell, python or golang', 'Must have expertise in some of the following:', 'We are looking for a Cloud Engineer to help continuously evolve our infrastructure.\xa0 You will work to increase stability by looking for ways our current infrastructure can break and work to build chaos monkey level fault tolerance. Scalability is a shared concern with development and will require great communication skills to implement shared technologies such as Kafka and Vault.\xa0 All of this will also need to be done with job_title: Lead Software Engineer (Python, CUDA, Deep Learning Tools)
job_text: ['', 'Key skills include: Deep Learning Engineer, Machine Learning Software Engineer, TensorFlow, Keras, Pytorch, Deep Neural Networks, DNNs, CNNS, LSTMS, Research, Production Code, Software Engineer, Deep Learning Engineer.', 'We are an MIT spinout who are tackling an industry-wide problem within computer processing. From our research, we believe that our specific technology will bypass the limits of next-gen CPUs using a different approach to processing Deep Neural Networks. Currently, we are 50 people strong and are soon to be entering a rapid stage of growth, as we recently raised over $40 million dollars in our Series A from leading US VCs.', 'We are looking for a Lead Software Engineer to join our team who has strong rooted skills in creating high quality, robust production code whilst ideally having worked in a Machine Learning environment.\xa0As a Lead Software Engineer, you will build unique Machine Learning tools and ship them alongside their revolutionary hardware. The algorithms that go into these ML tools will come from their industry-leading ML/DL Scientists who are working at the intersection of Deep Learning and Optical AI Accelerators.', '\xa0', 'Lead Software Engineer (Python, CUDA, Deep Learning Tools)', '\ufeff', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0An opportunity to work with our collaborative research team on novel work that will revolutionize modern-day computing as we know it.', 'As a Lead Software Engineer, you will be one of our high-impact initial hires within our second office located in the Bay area as we rapidly scale.', 'What we can offer a Lead Software Engineer:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent benefits.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A culture of openness and collaboration – we are all working together under a shared vision.', 'our second office located in the Bay area']

job_title: Remote Data Engineer - Data Warehousing, Data Quality
job_text: ['', ' Medical', ' Vacation/PTO', 'Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : DS15-1614165 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***', ' Performs tasks and duties related to ad hoc analysis, design and processing.', ' Dental', ' Debugging, monitoring and troubleshooting existing Data Warehouse solutions and applications.', ' Understanding of Big Data Ecosystems is an advantage. Understanding of Snowflake, GCP or MS Azure would help Experience in working with Java would be plus.', ' Understanding of Big Data Ecosystems is an advantage.', ' Translate business requirements into Data/ETL Solutions', 'CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer', ' Design, develop and validate various Data Warehousing & Data Analysis solutions. Work with business users to establish requirements to achieve business objectives through Data. Decompose the business requirements into one or more reusable DW/ETL products. Translate business requirements into Data/ETL Solutions Performs tasks and duties related to ad hoc analysis, design and processing. Ensure effective communication of user requirements. Debugging, monitoring and troubleshooting existing Data Warehouse solutions and applications. Excellent working knowledge of large data manipulation and data mining using complex SQL. Implement data validation/verification strategies, plans and use cases for various Data Warehousing & Data Analysis solutions. ['', 'Our idea was born when we, like millions of students in the US, had to invest in our education. Information, assistance, and money for college were hard to come by. Our goal is to change that system and help students better invest in their own future.', "We invite you to a world of rapid prototyping, where you can be part of the conversation of new ideas and their implementation. Requests are considered on a case-by-case basis.Learn more aboutLegal and regulatory guidance ', 'Follow the prompts to select your resume and/or other supporting documents to be included with your application package', 'Specialized Experience', 'DutiesSummaryAs a senior Data Scientist and recognized authority, this position provides leadership to meet organizational strategic goals that advance the use of data science methods and tools for scientific discovery and promoting public health. This position provides technical expertise and project leadership necessary to advance strategic initiatives in the use and effectiveness of data- and knowledge-driven methods.ResponsibilitiesAs a Data Scientist, you will: Identify, evaluate, and recommend tools, techniques, and methods to increase access to and utility of clinical, biological, and other scientific datasets and knowledgebases Develop and apply analytical, machine learning, natural language processing, graph/network, visualization, and reporting tools to data sets in order to further scientific understanding and derive knowledge from data. Produce computer-based solutions to meet the data science needs of researchers, including developing novel data science methods and implementing existing data science methods to extract, organize, integrate, interpret, and visualize data stored in data systems. Provide expert leadership in designing, implementing, managing, and evaluating extremely large, highly complex data applications, projects, and studies. Represent an organization and support the work of data science related organizations in developing, recommending, and implementing data science methods and tools. Assist researchers with developing FAIR data management plans, and serve as an advocate for research data stewardship. Travel RequiredNot requiredSupervisory statusNoPromotion Potential14  Job family (Series) RequirementsConditions of Employment U.S. Citizenship requirement or proof of being a U.S. National must be met by closing date. Employment is subject to the successful completion of the pre-appointment process (i.e., background investigation, verification of qualifications and job requirements, completion of onboarding forms, submission of required documents, etc.) Males born after December 31, 1959 must be registered with the Selective Service. Applicants must meet all qualifications requirements within thirty (30) calendar days of the closing date of this announcement, including time in grade. This position has a positive education requirement. QualificationsTo qualify for this position, you must meet the education requirement and specialized experience listed below.EDUCATION REQUIREMENTThis is an interdisciplinary position where you can meet the education requirement by possessing any of the following:General Medical and Healthcare Series, 0601A bachelor\'s or graduate/higher level degree in a major study in an academic field related to the medical field, health sciences or allied sciences appropriate to the work of the position.ORGeneral Physical Science Series, 1301  A Bachelor\'s degree, or graduate/higher level degree with a major study in physical science, engineering, or mathematics that included 24 semester hours in physical science and/or related engineering science such as mechanics, dynamics, properties of materials, and electronics.OR A combination of education and experience that is equivalent to a major in physical science, engineering, or mathematics. You must have completed course work that included at least 24 semester hours in physical science and/or related engineering science, plus appropriate experience or additional education.ORGeneral Mathematics and Statistics Series, 1501 A Bachelor\'s degree, or graduate/higher level degree with a major study in mathematics, statistics, or actuarial science.OR A combination of education and experience that is the equivalent to a major in mathematics, statistics, or actuarial science. You must have completed course work that included at least 24 semester hours in mathematics, statistics, or actuarial science, plus have appropriate experience or additional education.All degrees and education must be from an educational program from an accrediting body recognized by the U.S. Department of Education at the time the degree was obtained or education completed.Specialized ExperienceIn addition to the education requirement, you must demonstrate in your resume at least one (1) year of qualifying experience equivalent to at least the GS-13 level in the Federal service obtained in either the private or public sector, performing the following types of tasks: developing organizational data-related strategies and procedures by partnering with the relevant stakeholders (e.g., researchers, leadership) to build consensus around data standardization, integration, sharing, and security processes that provide reliable/readily available data to make informed decisions. This specialized experience includes responsibilities such as: Providing oversight and guidance on the implementation and integration of state-of-the-art technologies and solutions for a scientific research organization. Supporting scientific data and knowledge management systems by providing guidance on administration and management functions such as architecture, infrastructure, policy development, technology evaluation, short- and long-term planning, etc. Providing guidance on creating and modifying scientific applications using programming languages (e.g., R, Python, SQL, Scala, Java, C/C++, Julia) to facilitate data clean-up, standardization, analysis, and retrieval efforts across an organization. Presenting findings to senior-level leadership through data visualization techniques (e.g., interactive dashboards, charts, graphs) using programming (e.g., R, Python, SQL, Scala, Java, C/C++, Julia) or software packages (e.g., MatLab, Tableau). Do not copy and paste the duties, specialized experience, or occupational assessment questionnaire from this announcement into your resume as that will not be considered a demonstration of your qualifications for this position.You will receive credit for all experience material to the position, including experience gained in religious, civic, welfare, service, and organizational activities, regardless of whether you received pay.Preview Assessment Questionnaire Before You ApplyEducationThis position has an education requirement. ['', 'RPI is passionate about helping businesses grow through the power of personalized print.\xa0RPI acquired Blurb in 2020 and this position will be doing work for primarily the Blurb ecommerce business as well as some data work for RPI. To date we have printed nearly 30 million books and have over 3.3M+ unique users. Blurb\xa0includes a team of design, technology and media veterans who share a passion for helping people bring their stories to life. ['', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:• \xa0 \xa0Lead the design and implementation of features/systems to enable Best Buy Health to invoice B2C & B2B customers, integrated into eligibility, reporting and marketing systems• \xa0 \xa0Integrate billing system to support upstream (pricing, product, customer) and downstream (finance, invoicing) systems/processes• \xa0 \xa0Assist Billing Engineering Manager with recruiting engineering talent, defining long term roadmaps, budgeting/capacity planning and guiding technical teams during design & development• \xa0 \xa0Collaborate with architects, product development and business partners to ensure the billing system roadmap aligns with security, industry compliance and future health product and service offering• \xa0 \xa0Lead the team in providing support for key IT security and compliance initiatives: ensuring solid security practice and documentation, working with compliance team members on ensuring proper policy and procedure, ensuring regular testing to keep the application secure, and working with customers and vendors to ensure acceptable IT security policy• \xa0 \xa0Coordinate and execute key initiatives to incorporate support of new products and services into the billing platform• \xa0 \xa0Create prototypes of new applications for feasibility and reference for future development• \xa0 \xa0Research new technologies and drive adoption where appropriate• \xa0 \xa0Coach and mentor members of the development and SQA team ', 'Experience: ', 'QUALIFICATIONS:', ' ', 'ABOUT THE TEAM:The Best Buy Health’s Billing Systems engineering team is responsible for the robust billing systems we rely on to invoice our customers and payors accurately. \xa0Additionally, the team is charged with providing an elegant platform for our internal stakeholders to integrate new products and services. \xa0This new team’s initial roadmap will include standing up and integrating a new billing system & process in Best Buy Health infrastructure. \xa0We also strive to maintain a strong bond and trust between our internal teams (architecture, development, test, configuration, and operations). \xa0We encourage each other to work together and help one another make our work life at Best Buy Health more satisfying and rewarding. \xa0 ', 'Personal Attributes:', 'Knowledge/Skills/Abilities: ', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'SCHEDULE: ', 'TRAVEL REQUIREMENTS:', 'ABOUT THE JOB:', 'FLSA:', 'QUALIFICATIONS: ', 'ABOUT THE JOB:We are looking for a results-driven Senior Engineer with billing system experience who is ready to be challenged to integrate & set up a new billing system into the Best Buy Health infrastructure. \xa0As a Senior Engineer, you will be responsible for designing and developing highly scalable and elegant solutions. \xa0You will be the technical lead on an engineering team who will build and maintain the core billing systems that will integrate with the Best Buy corporate infrastructure (i.e. POS, web, CRM, Order Management), covered entities, commercial partners and responsible for sourcing data for reporting and marketing campaigns. ', 'Experience: • \xa0 \xa0Experience in delivering highly available products or systems in various roles, experience in lead engineer or architect roles preferred• \xa0 \xa0Minimum 5 years of experience developing object-oriented applications using .NET Core/C#/.NET required• \xa0 \xa0Working knowledge using cloud native and modern infrastructure (Kubernetes, Azure, Blob storage, Kafka) \xa0preferred• \xa0 \xa0Experience in designing/developing billing/payments/financial/logistics systems is strongly preferred• \xa0 \xa0Zuora Billing System and Snowflake experience highly desired• \xa0 \xa0Experience integrating enterprise infrastructure with 3rd party solutions via modern APIs is strongly preferred• \xa0 \xa0Experience working on APIs and large scale, complex platform products is desirable• \xa0 \xa0Technically strong with CS or Engineering degree or prior experience in Engineering is strongly preferred ', 'DEPARTMENT: ', 'Knowledge/Skills/Abilities: • \xa0 \xa0Experience with modern APIs, microservice architecture, cloud technologies and data engineering• \xa0 \xa0Understanding of CCPA, PCI, HIPAA & HITRUST rules and compliance• \xa0 \xa0Understanding Agile, iterative, and incremental development methodologies • \xa0 \xa0Understanding of distributed systems, asynchronous message passing, and distributed algorithms in high availability systems • \xa0 \xa0Strong software development leadership skills: able to organize a team and produce forward product momentum at both small and medium scales• \xa0 \xa0Broad understanding of software development; both tools and processes for teams as well as concepts and practices for individuals• \xa0 \xa0Familiarity with continuous delivery, processes, DevOps tools, Git preferred• \xa0 \xa0Demonstrated implementation capabilities; able to learn new frameworks or tools and quickly put them to productive use in building product• \xa0 \xa0Knowledge of Microsoft Office (Excel, Project, Outlook, Word, Visio) required ', 'DIRECT REPORTS:', 'REPORTING SUPERVISOR: ', 'POSITION: ', 'ABOUT THE TEAM:', 'EMPLOYMENT STATUS: ', 'Education: ', 'POSITION: Senior Software Engineer (Billing Systems)DEPARTMENT: Commercial Technology REPORTING SUPERVISOR: Manager, Billing SystemsDIRECT REPORTS:\xa0NoFLSA:\xa0ExemptEMPLOYMENT STATUS: Direct HireTRAVEL REQUIREMENTS:\xa0At most 5% travel SCHEDULE: Standard Business Hours ', "Education: Bachelor's degree required ", 'Personal Attributes:• \xa0 \xa0You have strong communication and interpersonal skills, as well as the adeptness to influence and communicate effectively.• \xa0 \xa0Strongly self-directed; can take very high-level goals and set individual tasks for both self and others while reporting status and adjusting as necessary• \xa0 \xa0Solid interpersonal skills; can build relationships inside and outside the engineering and IT teams• \xa0 \xa0Ability to balance long-term roadmaps and tactical items; ['', 'KEY RESPONSIBILITIES OF THE ROLE', 'ATTRIBUTES OF PROFESSIONALS IN THIS ROLE', 'DESIRED EXPERIENCE AND REQUIREMENTS', 'Foster a culture of sharing, re-use, design for scale stability, and operational efficiency of data and analytical solutions', 'Our Executive Recruiters have established relationships with many of the best and brightest professionals in the industry. Based on our unique approach to recruiting and expertise in assessing opportunities and talent, we have the ability to expose you to the top career opportunities on the market.', 'As we continue to grow and deepen our impact on organizations around the world, we are looking for the right people to place in key executive roles. If you are interested in finding the best opportunity on your career path, there are a few things you should know about RGP:', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills\xa0', 'Provide insights to senior leadership based on business and team learnings', 'Experience working in large corporations', 'If this sounds like you, we invite you to read on and learn more.\xa0THE RGP EXECUTIVE SEARCH EXPERIENCEAt RGP, we’re deeply invested in identifying your strengths as an Executive Professional. We understand it’s not simply about finding a position – it’s about your career objectives, goals and aspirations. In other words, it’s about you.\xa0PURPOSE OF THE ROLE', 'We are energized by the opportunity of identifying and placing top Executive talent.', 'As a Principal Data Scientist, you will be responsible for designing, planning, developing, and delivering data science-based products as a part of an integrated team to improve performance of the company’s core operations. In this role, you will work with various teams to define opportunities and perform corresponding hypothesis development of efficient and accurate analytical models.', 'We are energized by the opportunity of identifying and placing top Executive talent.We like working with organizations that are positive, adaptable and growth-minded.We care how work gets accomplished and are deeply invested in the success of our clients and their Executive Professionals.', 'PURPOSE OF THE ROLE', 'Equal Opportunity Employer', 'We care how work gets accomplished and are deeply invested in the success of our clients and their Executive Professionals.', 'Equal Opportunity EmployerRGP is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer and committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, gender, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, physical or mental disability, genetic information or veteran status, and encourage all applicants to apply.', '6 – 10 years of relevant industry experience', 'Acquire, ingest, and process data from multiple sources and systems into Big Data platforms to capture value from analytical effortsProvide insights to senior leadership based on business and team learningsMentor Data Scientist and provide guidance to fellow Data Scientists when necessaryFoster a culture of sharing, re-use, design for scale stability, and operational efficiency of data and analytical solutions', 'Detail oriented\xa0', 'MSc or PhD in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Applied Statistics or Mathematics', 'Acquire, ingest, and process data from multiple sources and systems into Big Data platforms to capture value from analytical efforts', 'MSc or PhD in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Applied Statistics or Mathematics6 – 10 years of relevant industry experienceExperience with Python, AWS, Azure, or SparkExperience working in large corporations', 'Strong analytical skills\xa0', 'RGP is a global Consulting and Executive Search firm helping some of the most recognized companies in the world work differently. We will connect you to opportunities that matter, putting your expertise to best use while developing skills for the future.\xa0', 'THE RGP EXECUTIVE SEARCH EXPERIENCE', 'We like working with organizations that are positive, adaptable and growth-minded.', 'Experience with Python, AWS, Azure, or Spark', 'Mentor Data Scientist and provide guidance to fellow Data Scientists when necessary', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills\xa0Strong analytical skills\xa0Detail oriented\xa0']

['', "The team is missioned to build infrastructures, platforms, and technologies, as well as to support cross-functional teams to protect our users, products, and infrastructures. In this team, you'll have a unique opportunity to have first-hand exposure to the strategy of the company in key security initiatives, especially in building scalable and secure-by-design systems and solutions. Our challenges are not your regular day-to-day technical problems; you'll be part of a team that's developing new solutions to new challenges of a kind not previously addressed by big tech. It's working fast, at scale, and we're making a difference.", '- Work with product engineering team on system design, software platforms, capacity planning, and launch reviews throughout the whole lifecycle of services.', '- Consistently evolve systems by pushing for changes that improve reliability and velocity.', 'Security Team at TikTok', '- Experience and understanding of infrastructure-as-code concepts, approaches, methods, and tooling.', '- Practice sustainable incident response and postmortems.', '- Experience in analyzing and debugging production issues at scale.', 'TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Mumbai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo.', '- Maintain sustainable scalability of software systems by building automations to measure and monitoring availability, scalability, latency, and overall system health.', 'Responsibilities', 'Qualifications', '- Excellent programming, debugging, and optimization skills in general purpose programming languages but not limited to: Go, Python, C/C++, Rust, or Java.', "*TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We believe individuals shouldn't be disadvantaged because of their background or identity, but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.", 'TikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations during our recruitment process. If you need assistance or an accommodation, please reach out to us at USRC@tiktok.com.', '- BS degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or relevant majors with 2+ years of working experience. ']

Financial industry exposure a plus but not at all required', 'Data-oriented experience with languages such as Python, Rust, Scala, Java, C#, etc. (We work primarily in Python, but feel that the right candidate can come from any language background.)', 'The Software Engineer will be a key member of a small, focused product team working to create new platforms that BAM’s data analysts, data scientists, quantitative investors, and researchers can rely on for sourcing data sets. If you’re the kind of person who gets excited by the prospect of wrapping your mind around a different problem each day, we’d love to chat with you.', 'Humble, team-player who wants to win', 'Create software that is well commented, well understood, well tested, and well documented – quality above all!', 'Experience with basic DevOps techniques, including CI/CD and infrastructure-as-code', 'Gain a deep understanding of data requirements and utilization for quantitative investment, in order to help drive prioritization and design decisions.', 'Work and collaborate as part of a globally distributed engineering team.', 'Among other things, the Software Engineer will:', 'Degree in Computer Science or closely related fieldA passion for data and experience in applying that passion to high quality data productsStrong knowledge of software engineering best practices, object oriented concepts, and the ins and outs of data-focused developmentData-oriented experience with languages such as Python, Rust, Scala, Java, C#, etc. (We work primarily in Python, but feel that the right candidate can come from any language background.)Intermediate or better knowledge of SQL and experience writing production queries against one or more SQL DBMSExperience with basic DevOps techniques, including CI/CD and infrastructure-as-codeExperience working in at least one cloud environment. Familiarity with AWS a big plus5+ years of professional software development experience. Financial industry exposure a plus but not at all requiredSelf-starter who is not afraid to ask questions and who can thrive in a fast-paced and agile environment where a one-line email can morph into a weeks-long projectHumble, team-player who wants to win', 'Self-starter who is not afraid to ask questions and who can thrive in a fast-paced and agile environment where a one-line email can morph into a weeks-long project', 'ROLE OVERVIEW', 'Help in partnering with end users in order to understand and flesh out requirements as well as provide occasional first level support.', 'Devise and develop data solutions leveraging various cloud-based data, database, and distributed computing technologies.', 'Intermediate or better knowledge of SQL and experience writing production queries against one or more SQL DBMS', 'Degree in Computer Science or closely related field', 'Devise and develop data solutions leveraging various cloud-based data, database, and distributed computing technologies.Gain a deep understanding of data requirements and utilization for quantitative investment, in order to help drive prioritization and design decisions.Help in partnering with end users in order to understand and flesh out requirements as well as provide occasional first level support.Apply creativity and lateral thinking in order to craft high performance solutions to loading and serving large amounts of investment data.Work and collaborate as part of a globally distributed engineering team.Create software that is well commented, well understood, well tested, and well documented – quality above all!', 'QUALIFICATIONS\xa0&\xa0REQUIREMENTS:', 'Experience working in at least one cloud environment. Familiarity with AWS a big plus', 'A passion for data and experience in applying that passion to high quality data products']

['', ' Design and implement the architecture to train, validate and deploy AI/ML pipelines and models at scale. Build the infrastructure required for extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using technologies such as Athena, SQS, parquet files, etc. Build and maintain scalable web services to power real-time responses to analytical queries around forecasting and pricing.  Collaborate closely with data scientists and analysts to automate the processes around cleansing and validating data.  Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics. Collaborate with stakeholders including the Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs. ', 'Experience with cloud services from at least one of the major public cloud providers (AWS, GCP, Azure, etc) and knowledge of the role and value each of the multitude of services provide in building a modern data pipeline. ', 'Experience and familiarity of ML/AI pipelines, tools, and architectures that enable the training, validation and deployment at scale of AI based technologies. ', 'Build and maintain scalable web services to power real-time responses to analytical queries around forecasting and pricing. ', 'BS degree in Computer Science or related technical field', 'Build the infrastructure required for extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using technologies such as Athena, SQS, parquet files, etc.', 'Strong analytical skills related to working with unstructured datasets.', 'Collaborate closely with data scientists and analysts to automate the processes around cleansing and validating data. ', 'Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.', 'About Duetto', '10+ years experience building enterprise grade scalable applications including 3+ years building modern data pipelines and productionizing machine learning models', 'Collaborate with stakeholders including the Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs.', 'Expert in server side programming languages such as Java and Python. ', 'Advanced SQL knowledge and experience working with both relational and NoSQL databases such as MongoDB', 'Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics.', 'Desired Skills & Expertise', 'Design and implement the architecture to train, validate and deploy AI/ML pipelines and models at scale.', ' BS degree in Computer Science or related technical field 10+ years experience building enterprise grade scalable applications including 3+ years building modern data pipelines and productionizing machine learning models Experience with cloud services from at least one of the major public cloud providers (AWS, GCP, Azure, etc) and knowledge of the role and value each of the multitude of services provide in building a modern data pipeline.  Experience and familiarity of ML/AI pipelines, tools, and architectures that enable the training, validation and deployment at scale of AI based technologies. ['', ' Bioinformatics: (100%)', 'Minimum Requirements', ' Thrive in a fast-paced work environment that requires independent self-direction with an aptitude for team collaboration and open communication.', ' Good understanding of human genetics.', 'Working Conditions', ' Serve as a technical expert in the bioinformatics software developed, guiding other staff, researchers, and clients in its use.', 'Application Process', ' Strong knowledge of exploratory data analyses.', ' Provide support in writing manuscripts, abstracts and presentations.', ' Strong written and oral communication skills.Desired Requirements', ' Excellent collaborator with interdisciplinary teams.', ' High-level computer programming language', ' Knowledge of next-generation (Illumina) DNA sequencing chemistry', ' Please note that your application will not be reviewed, and you will not be considered for this position until all required assessments have been completed.', ' Ability to utilize computational tools in common scripting languages (e.g. Linux, Perl, Python, and R).', ' Genetics and DNA variation', ' Experience working with high performance computing.', 'Responsibilities', ' Analytical and troubleshooting skills for wet-bench laboratory protocols', ' Other duties may be assigned.As a UW employee, you will enjoy generous benefits and work/life programs. For a complete description of our benefits for this position, please visit our website, click here.Minimum Requirements', ' Design, develop, and maintain research-related custom software used in a high-throughput, second-generation DNA sequencing laboratory.', ' BS in human genetics, bioinformatics, computer sciences or related field, or equivalent experience.', ' Experience working with command line-based software for genetic analysis and next-generation sequencing protocols (e.g. BWA, GATK, SamTools, BCFtools and shell scripting).', 'Desired Requirements', ' Dissect and analyze complex research problems using a multitude of programming languages that interact with our existing software architecture.', ' Knowledge of laboratory information systems (LIMS) design and implementationWorking ConditionsThe Bioinformatics Analyst position is expected to respond immediately to questions from investigators, teammates, and provide expert technical support for developing or trouble-shooting workflows. On occasion, it will be neceessary to respond immediately to urgent questions from the P.I. and other managers if problems arise that impact the work flow or deadlines for the NWGC production center - these tend to happen on a weekly basis and occasionally require extra hours be worked on a given day.Application ProcessThe application process for UW positions may include completion of a variety of online assessments to obtain additional information that will be used in the evaluation process. These assessments may include Work Authorization, Cover Letter and/or others. Any assessments that you need to complete will appear on your screen as soon as you select “Apply to this position”. Once you begin an assessment, it must be completed at that time; if you do not complete the assessment you will be prompted to do so the next time you access your “My Jobs” page. If you select to take it later, it will appear on your "My Jobs" page to take when you are ready.  Please note that your application will not be reviewed, and you will not be considered for this position until all required assessments have been completed.', ' High performance cluster management', ' Linux experience', ' Present analysis findings at group meetings and national conferences, if necessary.', ' Masters or Ph.D., or foreign equivalent, in human genetics, bioinformatics, computer sciences, or related field', ' Ability to manage projects and solve problems independently.', ' A minimum 3 years of experience working with next-generation sequencing data and relevant tools for bioinformatics analysis, in either a professional or academic setting.', ' Design, develop, and maintain research-related custom software used in a high-throughput, second-generation DNA sequencing laboratory.  Serve as a technical expert in the bioinformatics software developed, guiding other staff, researchers, and clients in its use.  Dissect and analyze complex research problems using a multitude of programming languages that interact with our existing software architecture.  Participate in developing, implementing and maintaining new workflows for NGS.  Thrive in a fast-paced work environment that requires independent self-direction with an aptitude for team collaboration and open communication.  Provide support in writing manuscripts, abstracts and presentations.  Present analysis findings at group meetings and national conferences, if necessary.  Other duties may be assigned.As a UW employee, you will enjoy generous benefits and work/life programs. For a complete description of our benefits for this position, please visit our website, click here.Minimum Requirements  BS in human genetics, bioinformatics, computer sciences or related field, or equivalent experience.  A minimum 3 years of experience working with next-generation sequencing data and relevant tools for bioinformatics analysis, in either a professional or academic setting.  Good understanding of human genetics.  Strong knowledge of exploratory data analyses.  Ability to utilize computational tools in common scripting languages (e.g. Linux, Perl, Python, and R).  Experience working with high performance computing.  Ability to manage projects and solve problems independently.  Excellent collaborator with interdisciplinary teams.  Strong written and oral communication skills.Desired Requirements  Masters or Ph.D., or foreign equivalent, in human genetics, bioinformatics, computer sciences, or related field  Experience working with command line-based software for genetic analysis and next-generation sequencing protocols (e.g. BWA, GATK, SamTools, BCFtools and shell scripting).  Genetics and DNA variation  High-level computer programming language  High performance cluster management  Linux experience  Analytical and troubleshooting skills for wet-bench laboratory protocols  Knowledge of next-generation (Illumina) DNA sequencing chemistry  Knowledge of laboratory information systems (LIMS) design and implementationWorking ConditionsThe Bioinformatics Analyst position is expected to respond immediately to questions from investigators, teammates, and provide expert technical support for developing or trouble-shooting workflows. On occasion, it will be neceessary to respond immediately to urgent questions from the P.I. and other managers if problems arise that impact the work flow or deadlines for the NWGC production center - these tend to happen on a weekly basis and occasionally require extra hours be worked on a given day.Application ProcessThe application process for UW positions may include completion of a variety of online assessments to obtain additional information that will be used in the evaluation process. These assessments may include Work Authorization, Cover Letter and/or others. Any assessments that you need to complete will appear on your screen as soon as you select “Apply to this position”. Once you begin an assessment, it must be completed at that time; if you do not complete the assessment you will be prompted to do so the next time you access your “My Jobs” page. If you select to take it later, it will appear on your "My Jobs" page to take when you are ready.  Please note that your application will not be reviewed, and you will not be considered for this position until all required assessments have been completed.', ' Participate in developing, implementing and maintaining new workflows for NGS.']

['', 'Ensure quality of deliverables using development testing methods, code reviews and user acceptance testing\xa0', "Get your foot in the door with a Detroit-based company helping to drive exciting changes in the Mobility industry across the globe!Receive PAID technical training to diversify your skillset and background outside of the realm of your project load (think things like AWS Lambda, PCF, and other cloud-based technologies!)\xa0Establish a professional identity and story for yourself among executive leadership by engaging in Brooksource's professional development program.", 'Start Date: February 1st, 2021', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related fieldKnowledge of object oriented programming fundamentals in a language like Java, C#, C++, Python, etcKnowledge of Agile methodologies and best practices\xa0Previous API development experience is a bonus', 'Jr. Software Engineer (Full Stack)', "What's In It For You...?", 'Minimum Requirements:', '\xa0Previous API development experience is a bonus', 'Get your foot in the door with a Detroit-based company helping to drive exciting changes in the Mobility industry across the globe!', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field', "As a Software Engineer with one of America's leading Mobility companies, you will join a team dedicated to completely reimagining a new digital experience for consumers looking to purchase vehicles. You will collaborate heavily with other Software Engineers in a pair-programming setting to continuously deliver user stories in a test-driven framework with a customer-centric focus. The ideal candidate comes from a Computer Science background and will be ready to learn while taking ownership of their day-to-day work creating digital consumer products! ", '$60,000-$65,000', 'Day-to-Day Responsibilities:', 'Receive PAID technical training to diversify your skillset and background outside of the realm of your project load (think things like AWS Lambda, PCF, and other cloud-based technologies!)\xa0', 'Pair with other software engineers to cooperatively deliver user stories', 'Full-Time, 40 hours/week', "Establish a professional identity and story for yourself among executive leadership by engaging in Brooksource's professional development program.", 'Create new, scalable, and impactful applications within an Agile environmentTroubleshoot issues and optimize existing applications to improve performancePair with other software engineers to cooperatively deliver user storiesEnsure quality of deliverables using development testing methods, code reviews and user acceptance testing\xa0', 'Knowledge of object oriented programming fundamentals in a language like Java, C#, C++, Python, etc', 'Create new, scalable, and impactful applications within an Agile environment', '\xa0', 'Dearborn, M', 'Knowledge of Agile methodologies and best practices', 'Troubleshoot issues and optimize existing applications to improve performance', 'If this sounds like you, please keep reading and apply today!']

job_title: Senior Application Engineer - Manufacturing Data Analytics
job_text: ['', 'Bachelor’s degree - required', 'SQL, SQL Plus experience – required', 'Who We Want', 'Analytical problem solvers.', 'Senior Application Engineer', 'You will lead problem management Initiatives associated with the software systems.', 'What You Will Do', 'You will analyze plant performance using data to make recommendations to help with plant performance.You will provide engineering support to operations processes, projects and functions through digital transformation.You will be evaluating robotics operations processes & outcomes and developing custom solutions to streamline and digitalize.You will be acting as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) on the applications, this role will mentor and support less experienced colleagues in order to ensure delivery of solutions that meet business needsYou will provide the following levels of support associated with Applications i.e 1 Support (e.g. general inquiries, technical questions, troubleshooting, problem reproduction and basic procedural “how-to questions.Level 2 Support (e.g. installation and configuration items, technical queries such as local system set-up, applying technical solutions to challenges)Level 3 Support (complex configuration and technical items)Level 4 Support (Managing vendor relationships on configuration and technical Items)', 'Previous applications and/or data analytics experience in digitalized shop floor manufacturing and operations - preferred', 'Self-directed initiators. ', 'Self-directed initiators. People who take ownership of their work and need no prompting to drive productivity, change, and outcomes.', 'What You Need', 'Collaborative partners. People who build and leverage cross-functional relationships to bring together ideas, data and insights to drive continuous improvement in functions.', 'Level 4 Support (Managing vendor relationships on configuration and technical Items)', 'You will be evaluating robotics operations processes & outcomes and developing custom solutions to streamline and digitalize.', ' 1 Support (e.g. general inquiries, technical questions, troubleshooting, problem reproduction and basic procedural “how-to questions.Level 2 Support (e.g. installation and configuration items, technical queries such as local system set-up, applying technical solutions to challenges)Level 3 Support (complex configuration and technical items)Level 4 Support (Managing vendor relationships on configuration and technical Items)', 'Level 2 Support (e.g. installation and configuration items, technical queries such as local system set-up, applying technical solutions to challenges)', '2+ years’ experience - required', 'Bachelor’s degree - requiredBachelor’s degree in engineering, computer programming, computer sciences, business IT – preferred2+ years’ experience - requiredPrevious applications and/or data analytics experience in digitalized shop floor manufacturing and operations - preferredSQL, SQL Plus experience – requiredIndustry 4.0 - preferred', 'You will analyze plant performance using data to make recommendations to help with plant performance.', 'Analytical problem solvers. People who go beyond just fixing to identify root causes, evaluate optimal solutions, and recommend comprehensive upgrades to prevent future issues.', 'Level 3 Support (complex configuration and technical items)', 'Bachelor’s degree in engineering, computer programming, computer sciences, business IT – preferred', ' 1 Support (e.g. general inquiries, technical questions, troubleshooting, problem reproduction and basic procedural “how-to questions.', 'You will be acting as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) on the applications, this role will mentor and support less experienced colleagues in order to ensure delivery of solutions that meet business needs', 'Industry 4.0 - preferred', 'Collaborative partners. ', 'Analytical problem solvers. People who go beyond just fixing to identify root causes, evaluate optimal solutions, and recommend comprehensive upgrades to prevent future issues.Collaborative partners. People who build and leverage cross-functional relationships to bring together ideas, data and insights to drive continuous improvement in functions.Self-directed initiators. People who take ownership of their work and need no prompting to drive productivity, change, and outcomes.', 'You will provide the following levels of support associated with Applications i.e 1 Support (e.g. general inquiries, technical questions, troubleshooting, problem reproduction and basic procedural “how-to questions.Level 2 Support (e.g. installation and configuration items, technical queries such as local system set-up, applying technical solutions to challenges)Level 3 Support (complex configuration and technical items)Level 4 Support (Managing vendor relationships on configuration and technical Items)', 'You will provide engineering support to operations processes, projects and functions through digital transformation.']

The software development team will provide application development and support to tools that allow mission analytic users to view existing data or contribute new information in a collaborative environment.', 'Provide recommendations for improving documentation and software development process standards', 'Analyze user requirements to derive software design and performance requirements', 'Position Description:\xa0', 'Develop simple data queries for existing or proposed databases or data repositories', 'Debug existing software and correct defects', 'Analyze systems flow, data usage and work processes; and investigate problem areas', 'Required Skills:', 'Develop or implement algorithms to meet or exceed system performance and functional standards', 'We are a woman-owned small business with an award-winning track record of designing, developing, and deploying best-of-breed technologies that address the nation’s pressing cyber and advanced technology needs. ', 'Knowledge of database performance characteristics based on the workload from front-end application servers', ' Extensive experience with PostgreSQL, MySQL and Oracle, Redis, Memcached, Kafka, Elastic Search Strong understanding of distributed data computing concepts, Ingestion technologies, persistent storage, NoSQL (at least one stack, preferably MongoDB, DynamoDB), batch and real-time processing of data. ['', 'Kubernetes, Terraform, Vault', "Paxos was founded in 2012 as the first institutional and regulated crypto-exchange, our founding team quickly realized there was an opportunity to establish ourselves as the trusted leader in digital assets. By creating regulated digital assets like our USD-backed stablecoin PAX, we’re giving customers the chance to process their financial transactions in safer, faster and more cost-effective ways. We’re also building solutions for some of the world’s best-known financial institutions to settle day-to-day transactions faster, cheaper and with the most modern technology. We believe the global financial system has relied too long on closed infrastructure and outdated technologies - it's time for a change.", 'A kitchen fully stocked with snacks and beverages\xa0', 'Competitive salaries and flexible work life balance\xa0', '5+ years of software development experienceAre technical experts in at least one domain like Distributed Systems, Cryptography, Databases, or AWSDemonstrate a solid understanding of core engineering concepts including data structures, design best practices, run-time optimizations, and algorithmic complexity\xa0Can understand and articulate the architecture of an entire system, including the technical trade-offs between different design implementationsAre eager to work openly and collaboratively with a diverse team and are willing to mentor more junior members of the teamCollaborate effectively with stakeholders across the company\xa0Constantly seek to learn new technologies and better ways to solve engineering challenges', '5+ years of software development experience', 'Why we are a great place to work:\xa0\xa0Paxos has been consistently named a\xa0Best Place to Work\xa0by BuiltIn. We offer all of the usual startup stuff like healthy snacks, coffee, and ping pong but we also offer generous healthcare coverage, PTO, and family leave. (We want employees to care for themselves both in and out of office.) In addition to the benefits and perks, Paxos offers employees the chance to have a real and measurable impact on a growing business: what you do today directly influences the Company goals. As a result, we enable every employee to substantially grow their careers.\xa0\xa0', 'Can understand and articulate the architecture of an entire system, including the technical trade-offs between different design implementations', 'Demonstrate a solid understanding of core engineering concepts including data structures, design best practices, run-time optimizations, and algorithmic complexity\xa0', 'Are eager to work openly and collaboratively with a diverse team and are willing to mentor more junior members of the team', 'Java, Kotlin, Go', 'Who are our customers:\xa0Our customers run the gamut from individuals seeking access to digital assets and those who don’t want to be tied to a physical banking system, to large institutions seeking to improve their settlement infrastructure. Some of our clients today include big names like Credit Suisse, Societe Generale, Macquarie, INTL FCStone and Virtu.\xa0', 'Competitive salaries and flexible work life balance\xa0Equity share in a growing business\xa0Unlimited PTO\xa0A full slate of benefits coverage including: medical, dental, vision, and pre-tax commuter benefits, gym reimbursements\xa0A kitchen fully stocked with snacks and beverages\xa0A fun, vibrant office environment in the Flatiron District with a smart and passionate team doing incredible things to modernize Finance.\xa0', 'We look for Senior Software Engineers who:\xa0', 'Java, Kotlin, GoReact.js TypescriptKubernetes, Terraform, Vault', 'Equity share in a growing business\xa0', 'Paxos uses a mix of open source technologies to build our products. While the exact technology or framework an engineer uses depends on the product they support, our engineers work with:\xa0', 'Partner with product managers, security engineers, and our operations team to roll out secure and scalable products', 'Are technical experts in at least one domain like Distributed Systems, Cryptography, Databases, or AWS', 'Collaborate effectively with stakeholders across the company\xa0', 'Depending on your technical skills, you could work on our APIs, the crypto exchange, or our blockchain settlements products. We’re constantly rolling out new features and adapting our existing products to meet user news or address technical challengesPartner with product managers, security engineers, and our operations team to roll out secure and scalable productsSenior Engineers contribute to more than our product – they build up our team. Through a combination of mentoring and technical leadership, they make others better and raise the bar for all around them.', 'A full slate of benefits coverage including: medical, dental, vision, and pre-tax commuter benefits, gym reimbursements\xa0', 'Unlimited PTO\xa0', 'A fun, vibrant office environment in the Flatiron District with a smart and passionate team doing incredible things to modernize Finance.\xa0', 'Senior Engineers contribute to more than our product – they build up our team. Through a combination of mentoring and technical leadership, they make others better and raise the bar for all around them.', '\xa0What We Offer:\xa0', 'Why we matter:\xa0Paxos is the only technology company building financial services solutions that both customers and regulators can trust. We’re committed to pushing the boundaries of technology while also working with important stakeholder groups so we can build a financial system that is open and accessible to anyone around the world.', 'React.js Typescript', 'Paxos is a product-led organization, with almost half of the company dedicated to product, engineering, site reliability, and security. As we plan to roll out new products and functionality, 50% of our planned headcount growth will be in our Engineering Department, and we are growing the team in New York and London.\xa0', 'We are looking for a\xa0Senior Software Engineer\xa0to join our rapidly growing engineering team. Our current team is made up of 40+ engineers, with a range of experience in startups and technologies. Senior Software Engineers are responsible for building, implementing and scaling key features of Paxos’ products, and will influence technical decisions that impact our code-base.\xa0Every engineer, despite seniority, has the ability and opportunity to influence our product strategy by helping define the product features, refine system architecture, and spearhead best practices that enable a high quality product. A commitment to teamwork, hustle, and strong communication skills are absolute requirements.\xa0\xa0', 'How we work:\xa0Paxos is driven by our\xa0four values. We believe that every Paxos employee is an owner, and employees consistently search for the truth in their work. We also believe in real-time candor and a shared commitment to excellence. These values are ingrained in everything we do and influence how we communicate and collaborate as an organization.\xa0', 'What You’ll Work On', 'What You’ll Work On:\xa0', 'Who we are:\xa0We are a diverse group of individuals with backgrounds and experience in banking, startups, tech giants, and big-five consulting firms. We currently have about 110 employees across offices in New York, London and Singapore and have big plans for our growth. We’re looking for collaborative, creative, hard-working and intellectually curious people to help us make our vision a reality.', 'Depending on your technical skills, you could work on our APIs, the crypto exchange, or our blockchain settlements products. We’re constantly rolling out new features and adapting our existing products to meet user news or address technical challenges', 'What We Offer:', 'Constantly seek to learn new technologies and better ways to solve engineering challenges', 'Senior Software Engineer']

', '  The Test Engineer will define and carry out all required development / validation testing to ensure achievement of all functional objectives and assure compliance to program goals. They will participate in supplier assessments and post-test inspection reviews; including detailed failure analysis   The Test Engineer handles the tasks of designing, developing protocols and testing reports for testing automobile products to meet product requirements. Job includes verification and validation of test plans, test procedures, test reports, developing testing methodology, techniques, and standards.   Responsible for designing, coordinating and conducting the Torque Security safety audit for new powertrain applications for both spark ignited engines and electrified powertrain systems.   The Engineer will plan, then conduct or supervise, a highly detailed series of electrical and CAN fault injections designed to test the Torque Security system’s capacity to detect failures and perform the necessary remedial action.   The engineer will generate reports, conduct test concern reviews with feature calibrators, and assist in investigations into software/logic errors uncovered during testing.   The Engineer will manipulate and utilize large and complex sets of engine mapping data to analyze and solve complex system problems as they relate to functional safety.   He/she will work cross functionally with engine development, powertrain controls and vehicle teams to identify solutions that achieve program requirements.   The candidate should expect to travel 1-3 weeks throughout the year for system validation/verification.   The VRT core test team is located at Chelsea Proving Grounds in Michigan but assists and trains other regions around the world to perform this vital function. ['', 'Software Engineer Co-op:', 'Putting you first', 'Please note that this is a 6 month assignment.\xa0Start and End Dates are determined by school schedules.', 'Proficiency in a managed language: e.g. C#, Java, etc.Proficiency in a scripting language such as Python or TerraformKnowledge of how the web works and experience with web-based markupSome experience working in the cloud: e.g. Azure, AWS, etc.', 'Knowledge of how the web works and experience with web-based markup', 'Learn software development process that related to financial institutions, and the industry at large', 'You’ll be assigned to work with the Bank Platform team building services and infrastructure for First Republic Bank.', 'First Republic Bank is looking for software engineers to help grow our core services team and participate in the development of application software that will be used in production.\xa0You’ll get to work in a professional environment and get exposure to how enterprise software is built and deployed at a financial institution.\xa0You’ll also get to work in fun environment that celebrates creativity with interesting people.', 'Familiarize yourself with secure software development in a highly-regulated environment', 'Proficiency in a scripting language such as Python or Terraform', 'Some experience working in the cloud: e.g. Azure, AWS, etc.', 'As a co-op, you will gain hands-on experience at a high-growth company that values its people. You’ll earn a competitive starting wage while absorbing a culture that emphasizes collaboration, entrepreneurial thinking and quick decision-making. Start doing the best work of your life here.', '\xa0', 'At First Republic, we care about our people. Founded in 1985, we offer extraordinary client service in private banking, private business banking and private wealth management. We believe that personal connections are everything and our success is driven by the relationships we form with our colleagues and clients. You’ll always feel empowered and valued here.\xa0', 'What you’ll do as a Software Engineer Co-op:', 'Proficiency in a managed language: e.g. C#, Java, etc.', 'You could be a great fit if you have:', 'You’ll be assigned to work with the Bank Platform team building services and infrastructure for First Republic Bank.Learn software development process that related to financial institutions, and the industry at largeFamiliarize yourself with secure software development in a highly-regulated environment']

['', 'We offer excellent compensation packages with market competitive pay, comprehensive healthcare packages, 401k matching, schedule flexibility, work from home opportunities, paid time off, and organizational growth potential.', 'Research technical solutions to business problems.', 'We work to help create seamless and positive experiences during life’s pivotal moments: applying for jobs or a mortgage, financing an education or buying a car. Our impact is real and to accomplish our goals we focus on nurturing our people for career advancement and their learning and development, supporting our next generation of leaders, maintaining an inclusive and diverse work environment, and regularly engaging and recognizing our employees. Regardless of location or role, the individual and collective work of our employees makes a difference and we are looking for talented team players to join us as we help people live their financial best.', 'Success Attributes of an Equifax employee; does this describe you?', 'Function:', 'Qualifications', 'Schedule:', 'Collaboration', 'Minimum 1 -2 year of relevant Java application development experience, Spring, Angular, \xa0REST', 'Accountability', 'You possess excellent communication, sharp analytical abilities, and proven design skills.', 'You possess excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to communicate with team members at various levels, including business leaders.', 'Trust', 'Participate in the development of code for Spring/Angular software applications.', 'Ownership', 'We offer excellent compensation packages with market competitive pay, comprehensive healthcare packages, 401k matching, schedule flexibility, work from home opportunities, paid time off, and organizational growth potential.Grow at your own pace through online courses at Learning @ Equifax.', 'Bravery', 'Good understanding of Java coding fundamentals and open source technologies.', 'Grow at your own pace through online courses at Learning @ Equifax.', 'At Equifax, we believe knowledge drives progress. As a global data, analytics and technology company, we play an essential role in the global economy by helping employers, employees, financial institutions and government agencies make critical decisions with greater confidence.\xa0', 'Think and act differently', "What you'll do", 'Self-starter, motivated, and actively learning and researching new methods of work and new technology.', 'Who is Equifax?\xa0', 'Develop detailed technical analysis and design specifications based on functional requirements.', "Minimum Bachelor's degree in computer science, information technology in computer science, information technology or equivalent with relevant 1-2 years of industry experience, work-study, and/or internship experience.", 'Participate in the gathering and reviewing of business requirements and translating these into functional/technical designs.Develop detailed technical analysis and design specifications based on functional requirements.Use object-oriented techniques and software engineering best practices including design reviews, code reviews, unit-testing.Participate in the development of code for Spring/Angular software applications.Research technical solutions to business problems.Follow agile best practices and maintain/improve the work of the agile team.Constantly learn about the latest technologies and seek their best use in the products.Self-starter, motivated, and actively learning and researching new methods of work and new technology.', 'Constantly learn about the latest technologies and seek their best use in the products.', 'The Perks of being an Equifax Employee?', 'Use object-oriented techniques and software engineering best practices including design reviews, code reviews, unit-testing.', 'You have experience developing accessible technologies.', 'Decide-Execute-Ship', 'Understanding of agile software development methodologies.', 'If this sounds like somewhere you want to work, don’t delay, apply today - we’re looking for you!', 'Primary Location:', 'You are a self-starter, highly motivated, and have a real passion for actively learning and researching new methods of work and new technology.', 'AccountabilityBraveryCuriosityCollaborationThink and act differentlyTrustOwnershipDecide-Execute-Ship', 'Participate in the gathering and reviewing of business requirements and translating these into functional/technical designs.', 'Curiosity', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'You have the ability to operate across a broad and complex business unit with multiple stakeholders.', "Minimum Bachelor's degree in computer science, information technology in computer science, information technology or equivalent with relevant 1-2 years of industry experience, work-study, and/or internship experience.Minimum 1 -2 year of relevant Java application development experience, Spring, Angular, \xa0RESTGood understanding of Java coding fundamentals and open source technologies.You have experience developing accessible technologies.Understanding of agile software development methodologies.You possess excellent communication, sharp analytical abilities, and proven design skills.You are a self-starter, highly motivated, and have a real passion for actively learning and researching new methods of work and new technology.You possess excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to communicate with team members at various levels, including business leaders.You have the ability to operate across a broad and complex business unit with multiple stakeholders.", 'Follow agile best practices and maintain/improve the work of the agile team.']

['', 'Hands-on experience developing services on a public cloud platform (e.g., AWS, Azure, Oracle) Experience developing service-oriented architectures and web services security solutionsUnderstanding of object-oriented design and SDK development, specifically within a cloud environmentFamiliarity and understanding of distributed computing and cloud-based platforms.Understanding of cross-functional platform feature areas in cloud platforms.', ' ', 'Qualifications', '5+ years distributed service engineering experience in a software development environmentDevelopment experience in C, C++ and/or Java as well as scripting languagesExperience working in an agile developer team environment.Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to present complex information in a clear, concise manner to all audiencesComfortable in a collaborative, agile development environment.', 'Development experience in C, C++ and/or Java as well as scripting languages', 'As a Senior Engineer you will be responsible for ensuring that our cloud infrastructure solutions are designed and built with the highest level of scalability in mind. You will partner with others in our development team to implement solutions within a distributed computing environment. You will collaborate with others on the team to ensure systems under development are aligned with other systems our team is responsible for including security, identity, metrics, and others and assist in the deployment of distributed systems. You will assist in supporting operations for the systems that our team owns.', 'Understanding of cross-functional platform feature areas in cloud platforms.', 'Experience working in an agile developer team environment.', 'Oracle’s Cloud Platform team is building a set of highly available and scalable platform, features and services offered by Oracle Public Cloud (OPC). There is a high level of integration required with other platform team services and features', 'Experience developing service-oriented architectures and web services security solutions', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Familiarity and understanding of distributed computing and cloud-based platforms.', 'Hands-on experience developing services on a public cloud platform (e.g., AWS, Azure, Oracle) ', 'Oracle’s Cloud Infrastructure team is building new Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS) technologies that operate at high scale in a broadly distributed multi-tenant cloud environment.\xa0Our customers run their businesses on our cloud, and our mission is to provide them with best in class compute, storage, networking, database, and security.', 'These are exciting times in our space - we are growing fast, still at an early stage, and working on ambitious new initiatives.', 'Comfortable in a collaborative, agile development environment.', 'Senior or Principal Level Engineer – Cloud Infrastructure Group ', '5+ years distributed service engineering experience in a software development environment', '(This is a remote role. Post-COVID, you can choose to work from a local Oracle Office )', '\xa0', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to present complex information in a clear, concise manner to all audiences', 'You are part of the development team you will contribute to the creation of the Cloud Platform feature set.', 'You are a talented engineer at the individual contributor level.\xa0Want to build great cloud infrastructure technology in a vibrant, smart, high energy team? We are looking for a Senior Engineer with experience to join our development team. The ideal candidate will be technically strong and have an understanding of large-scale distributed systems (cloud-based environments). In addition, you will have some experience of taking a new major feature from start to release.\xa0We are looking for an excellent technical contributor to our team.', 'Understanding of object-oriented design and SDK development, specifically within a cloud environment', 'Requisitin ID\xa0https://oracle.taleo.net/careersection/2/jobdetail.ftl?job=20000JIL\xa0']
